entries.translation: An intricate object composed of nesting triangles made of an unknown material. The Aletheia reported that they uncovered it during an anomaly survey.

entries.original: The material has close to zero resistance. Conducting all of the ship's free energy through it didn't even make it warm.
entries.translation: The material has close to zero resistance. Conducting all of the ship's free energy through it didn't even make it warm.

entries.original: Starcom Components
entries.translation: Starcom Components

entries.original: Some equipment with Starcom markings.
entries.translation: Some equipment with Starcom markings.

entries.original: A device for controlling Xenium reactions. Since this is our own technology, we're not likely to learn much scientifically from this debris.
entries.translation: A device for controlling Xenium reactions. Since this is our own technology, we're not likely to learn much scientifically from this debris.

entries.original: Helium Giant
entries.translation: Helium Giant

entries.original: Gas giants are usually 99% hydrogen. This giant is mostly helium, suggesting that this planet underwent partial fusion at some point.
entries.translation: Gas giants are usually 99% hydrogen. This giant is mostly helium, suggesting that this planet underwent partial fusion at some point.

entries.original: Nexus Topology
entries.translation: Nexus Topology

entries.original: That gateway projected us through a space-time topology like the wormhole that pulled us into this universe. We essentially solved an equation that redefined the relationship between two points in space. Amazing!
entries.translation: That gateway projected us through a space-time topology like the wormhole that pulled us into this universe. We essentially solved an equation that redefined the relationship between two points in space. Amazing!

entries.original: Outpost Item
entries.translation: Outpost Item

entries.original: The outpost team has partially decoded the markings on the item they found. It seems to a navigational device of some kind?
entries.translation: The outpost team has partially decoded the markings on the item they found. It seems to a navigational device of some kind?

entries.original: Artifact Discharge
entries.translation: Artifact Discharge

entries.original:
The artifact has discharged a *massive* amount of energy.

We just discovered a half-dozen previously unknown particles.
entries.translation:
The artifact has discharged a *massive* amount of energy.

We just discovered a half-dozen previously unknown particles.

entries.original: Raider Debris
entries.translation: Raider Debris

entries.original: Analysis of the raider debris shows these were unmanned drones. They lack any kind of warp drive but have an interesting autonomous navigation system.
entries.translation: Analysis of the raider debris shows these were unmanned drones. They lack any kind of warp drive but have an interesting autonomous navigation system.

entries.original: Buried Ring Data
entries.translation: Buried Ring Data

entries.original: The data recovered from the buried ring is an exotic mathematical description of warp space. Possibly a coordinate system?
entries.translation: The data recovered from the buried ring is an exotic mathematical description of warp space. Possibly a coordinate system?

entries.original: Wormhole Formulae
entries.translation: Wormhole Formulae

entries.original: The alien field equations we uncovered are encoded coordinates intended to program the artifact we discovered.
entries.translation: The alien field equations we uncovered are encoded coordinates intended to program the artifact we discovered.

entries.original: The Aletheia
entries.translation: The Aletheia

entries.original: The Aletheia
entries.translation: The Aletheia

entries.original: The Aletheia
entries.translation: The Aletheia

entries.original: Celaeno Upgrade 1
entries.translation: Celaeno Upgrade 1

entries.original: Complete
entries.translation: Complete

entries.original: Derelict Scout
entries.translation: Derelict Scout

entries.original: Explorer
entries.translation: Explorer

entries.original: Partial
entries.translation: Partial

entries.original: Raider Outpost
entries.translation: Raider Outpost

entries.original: Raider Destroyer
entries.translation: Raider Destroyer

entries.original: Raider Light Lancer
entries.translation: Raider Light Lancer

entries.original: Raider Base
entries.translation: Raider Base

entries.original: Raider Scout
entries.translation: Raider Scout

entries.original: Rescuer
entries.translation: Rescuer

entries.original: Scout
entries.translation: Scout

entries.original: Starting Scout
entries.translation: Starting Scout

entries.original: Default
entries.translation: Default

entries.original: Asteroid Traders
entries.translation: Asteroid Traders

entries.original: Asteroids
entries.translation: Asteroids

entries.original: Refinery Traders
entries.translation: Refinery Traders

entries.original:
An old refinery converted to a trading outpost sits in a wide crater. A cluster of furry bipeds greet the survey team and offer a variety of resources.

It quickly becomes apparent that their pricing has a healthy margin built in.
entries.translation:
An old refinery converted to a trading outpost sits in a wide crater. A cluster of furry bipeds greet the survey team and offer a variety of resources.

It quickly becomes apparent that their pricing has a healthy margin built in.

entries.original: *See the traders' prices*
entries.translation: *See the traders' prices*

entries.original: We would be delighted to exchange resources with you at very reasonable rates.
entries.translation: We would be delighted to exchange resources with you at very reasonable rates.

entries.original: Have the team return to the ship, for now.
entries.translation: Have the team return to the ship, for now.

entries.original: Test the asteroids missions
entries.translation: Test the asteroids missions

entries.original: TESTING ASTEROIDS
entries.translation: TESTING ASTEROIDS

entries.original: Outpost Log
entries.translation: Outpost Log

entries.original: We've discovered gateway coordinates in a log entry found in an unused outpost. They mention the area as a possible source of ore.
entries.translation: We've discovered gateway coordinates in a log entry found in an unused outpost. They mention the area as a possible source of ore.

entries.original: Gateway coordinates [COORD] added to navigation computer.
entries.translation: Gateway coordinates [COORD] added to navigation computer.

entries.original: We've found an asteroid field. This is probably the source of ore the log entry we found referenced.
entries.translation: We've found an asteroid field. This is probably the source of ore the log entry we found referenced.

entries.original: Ancient Calculator
entries.translation: Ancient Calculator

entries.original: Embedded in the asteroid rock is an ancient device.
entries.translation: Embedded in the asteroid rock is an ancient device.

entries.original: This is a primitive computer used for predicting the orbits of celestial bodies-- it's just like the Antikythera Mechanism. Except it's electronic and in space.
entries.translation: This is a primitive computer used for predicting the orbits of celestial bodies-- it's just like the Antikythera Mechanism. Except it's electronic and in space.

entries.original: Blue Glyph Sphere
entries.translation: Blue Glyph Sphere

entries.original: A small (3cm) blue sphere covered with raised glyphs in an unknown language.
entries.translation: A small (3cm) blue sphere covered with raised glyphs in an unknown language.

entries.original: The spheres we found collectively represent a peace treaty between a civilization and an AI, likely one not created by that civilization.
entries.translation: The spheres we found collectively represent a peace treaty between a civilization and an AI, likely one not created by that civilization.

entries.original: Fossilized Transmitter
entries.translation: Fossilized Transmitter

entries.original: A primitive radio device, now turned to stone.
entries.translation: A primitive radio device, now turned to stone.

entries.original: This device was a short-range radio transmitter. It's strange that a metal object has partially ossified.
entries.translation: This device was a short-range radio transmitter. It's strange that a metal object has partially ossified.

entries.original: Green Glyph Sphere
entries.translation: Green Glyph Sphere

entries.original: A small (3cm) green sphere covered with raised glyphs in an unknown language.
entries.translation: A small (3cm) green sphere covered with raised glyphs in an unknown language.

entries.original: Verifies and expands our previous hypothesis regarding the orange sphere. These objects contain instructions that could be understood both by humans and a fairly advanced AI.
entries.translation: Verifies and expands our previous hypothesis regarding the orange sphere. These objects contain instructions that could be understood both by humans and a fairly advanced AI.

entries.original: Orange Glyph Sphere
entries.translation: Orange Glyph Sphere

entries.original: A small (3cm) orange sphere covered with raised glyphs in an unknown language.
entries.translation: A small (3cm) orange sphere covered with raised glyphs in an unknown language.

entries.original: Analysis shows that the markings are something of a hybrid between a natural language and a machine language. Possibly this object was used to instruct an AI?
entries.translation: Analysis shows that the markings are something of a hybrid between a natural language and a machine language. Possibly this object was used to instruct an AI?

entries.original: Stone Skull
entries.translation: Stone Skull

entries.original: Initially this appeared to be an unusually shaped rock of exceptional density, but is actually a fossilized skull.
entries.translation: Initially this appeared to be an unusually shaped rock of exceptional density, but is actually a fossilized skull.

entries.original: This creature had a very unusual biology, probably evolved in a low gravity environment. Unfortunately the specimen is so degraded there's little else to learn.
entries.translation: This creature had a very unusual biology, probably evolved in a low gravity environment. Unfortunately the specimen is so degraded there's little else to learn.

entries.original: Shattered Planetoid
entries.translation: Shattered Planetoid

entries.original: Data from the various strange objects we've found in these asteroids strongly points to this not being an natural field, but a small planetoid that was destroyed by some cataclysmic force.
entries.translation: Data from the various strange objects we've found in these asteroids strongly points to this not being an natural field, but a small planetoid that was destroyed by some cataclysmic force.

entries.original: Young Asteroid Field
entries.translation: Young Asteroid Field

entries.original: This is an unusually young asteroid field. It probably formed when a moon or planetoid broke up. There may be some valuable metal ores in these rocks.
entries.translation: This is an unusually young asteroid field. It probably formed when a moon or planetoid broke up. There may be some valuable metal ores in these rocks.

entries.original: All automated story tests in default path
entries.translation: All automated story tests in default path

entries.original: All automated story tests in default path
entries.translation: All automated story tests in default path

entries.original: Lots of Research Points
entries.translation: Lots of Research Points

entries.original: We've just discovered a hack that unlocks a bunch of RP.
entries.translation: We've just discovered a hack that unlocks a bunch of RP.

entries.original: Late Game Shields
entries.translation: Late Game Shields

entries.original: Mid Game Test
entries.translation: Mid Game Test

entries.original: Halt. This area is off-limits to unauthorized vessels. Depart immediately.
entries.translation: Halt. This area is off-limits to unauthorized vessels. Depart immediately.

entries.original: Perhaps we can reach some peaceful arrangement where we can conduct a scientific survey?
entries.translation: Perhaps we can reach some peaceful arrangement where we can conduct a scientific survey?

entries.original:
Are you suggesting a bribe? An Ermyr surety is payable but in blood!

I warn you again-- do not land on this planet.
entries.translation:
Are you suggesting a bribe? An Ermyr surety is payable but in blood!

I warn you again-- do not land on this planet.

entries.original: The translation pre-filter matrix shows wordplay signifiers. It is possible some portion of that comment was not literal. We may be able to negotiate if we can figure out what they want.
entries.translation: The translation pre-filter matrix shows wordplay signifiers. It is possible some portion of that comment was not literal. We may be able to negotiate if we can figure out what they want.

entries.original: We did not mean to trespass and will depart.
entries.translation: We did not mean to trespass and will depart.

entries.original: Very well. However, if you attempt to land on this planet there will be consequences.
entries.translation: Very well. However, if you attempt to land on this planet there will be consequences.

entries.original: We will not be intimidated.
entries.translation: We will not be intimidated.

entries.original: You have made a dangerous foe!
entries.translation: You have made a dangerous foe!

entries.original: You have been warned. This planet is off-limits to unauthorized vessels.
entries.translation: You have been warned. This planet is off-limits to unauthorized vessels.

entries.original:
"Annihilate the red pykyak with us!" This was an entertaining contract. Your copper is uncorroded.

 "Watch this planet", "Shadow this diplomat", "Deliver this artifact." Such dull chores. More copper, but more dull.
entries.translation:
"Annihilate the red pykyak with us!" This was an entertaining contract. Your copper is uncorroded.

 "Watch this planet", "Shadow this diplomat", "Deliver this artifact." Such dull chores. More copper, but more dull.

entries.original: What do you know about these ships with red and yellow markings?
entries.translation: What do you know about these ships with red and yellow markings?

entries.original: They are very recent arrivals to this region. Like the *pykyak fly*, they are annoying in small numbers. In large numbers they will pick your carcass clean.
entries.translation: They are very recent arrivals to this region. Like the *pykyak fly*, they are annoying in small numbers. In large numbers they will pick your carcass clean.

entries.original: We need your services to help us deal with these "red raiders". We have copper as payment. (-10 Copper)
entries.translation: We need your services to help us deal with these "red raiders". We have copper as payment. (-10 Copper)

entries.original:
Ahhh... I see. Our mutual friend did not describe your vessel accurately at all.

We will summon the fleet and dispatch this pestilence from the region. I will trust you not to try to land on this planet in our absence.
entries.translation:
Ahhh... I see. Our mutual friend did not describe your vessel accurately at all.

We will summon the fleet and dispatch this pestilence from the region. I will trust you not to try to land on this planet in our absence.

entries.original: We need your services to help us deal with these "red raiders". We have copper as payment. (-10 Copper)
entries.translation: We need your services to help us deal with these "red raiders". We have copper as payment. (-10 Copper)

entries.original: I've taken a look at that iridescent artifact you found. I've actually seen something like it at the Gemini Shipyards back home-- it was used for custom coloring of luxury vessels.
entries.translation: I've taken a look at that iridescent artifact you found. I've actually seen something like it at the Gemini Shipyards back home-- it was used for custom coloring of luxury vessels.

entries.original: Can we make use of it?
entries.translation: Can we make use of it?

entries.original: I've sent the details over to the lab. If you research Chromaplating, you'll be able to customize your ship's color scheme.
entries.translation: I've sent the details over to the lab. If you research Chromaplating, you'll be able to customize your ship's color scheme.

entries.original: Why would it be on a hidden outpost? Camouflaged ships?
entries.translation: Why would it be on a hidden outpost? Camouflaged ships?

entries.original:
Doesn't seem particularly useful as camouflage in space, since it just changes color and does nothing for the heat signature.

It's possible someone was working on a cloaking device and this is as far as their research took them. Or maybe they're just fashion forward.
entries.translation:
Doesn't seem particularly useful as camouflage in space, since it just changes color and does nothing for the heat signature.

It's possible someone was working on a cloaking device and this is as far as their research took them. Or maybe they're just fashion forward.

entries.original: Was there anything else?
entries.translation: Was there anything else?

entries.original: We've managed to acquire part of a new weapon design. Any suggestions for obtaining the rest?
entries.translation: We've managed to acquire part of a new weapon design. Any suggestions for obtaining the rest?

entries.original:
Assuming "ask nicely isn't on the table", some parts can be obtained from ship debris.

There's a bit of luck involved-- the chances of sensitive components surviving a catastrophic hull collapse isn't high. If you can remove the module before that happens, your odds improve significantly.
entries.translation:
Assuming "ask nicely isn't on the table", some parts can be obtained from ship debris.

There's a bit of luck involved-- the chances of sensitive components surviving a catastrophic hull collapse isn't high. If you can remove the module before that happens, your odds improve significantly.

entries.original: I have a question about alien factions.
entries.translation: I have a question about alien factions.

entries.original:
One of Starcom's primary missions is to establish and maintain peaceful relations with new civilizations whenever possible.

Normally there are strict protocols regarding first contact, but under mitigating circumstances they can be relaxed. The current circumstances are as mitigating as I've even seen.
entries.translation:
One of Starcom's primary missions is to establish and maintain peaceful relations with new civilizations whenever possible.

Normally there are strict protocols regarding first contact, but under mitigating circumstances they can be relaxed. The current circumstances are as mitigating as I've even seen.

entries.original: How should we respond to hostile factions?
entries.translation: How should we respond to hostile factions?

entries.original:
My current directives:

You are authorized to use all necessary force to defend Starcom personnel from immediate mortal threat, or to prevent death or suffering of innocent lives at scale.

Again, given the circumstances, I am allowing you significant discretion.
entries.translation:
My current directives:

You are authorized to use all necessary force to defend Starcom personnel from immediate mortal threat, or to prevent death or suffering of innocent lives at scale.

Again, given the circumstances, I am allowing you significant discretion.

entries.original: If we, inadvertently, initiated hostilities with another faction, can we repair relations?
entries.translation: If we, inadvertently, initiated hostilities with another faction, can we repair relations?

entries.original:
Incidents do happen. As a matter of practicality, most space faring civilizations do not enter a state of permanent war if two ships bump into each other or a shot across the bow was aimed a little too low.

Time without hostility may heal those wounds.
entries.translation:
Incidents do happen. As a matter of practicality, most space faring civilizations do not enter a state of permanent war if two ships bump into each other or a shot across the bow was aimed a little too low.

Time without hostility may heal those wounds.

entries.original:
But in interstellar diplomacy, words are louder than actions. What you say will be interpreted as a deliberate Starcom position.

Ironically, missteps over the comms channel may be harder to undo than those in open space.
entries.translation:
But in interstellar diplomacy, words are louder than actions. What you say will be interpreted as a deliberate Starcom position.

Ironically, missteps over the comms channel may be harder to undo than those in open space.

entries.original: No other questions about that.
entries.translation: No other questions about that.

entries.original: Was there anything else?
entries.translation: Was there anything else?

entries.original: What can I help you with?
entries.translation: What can I help you with?

entries.original:
I just read Lt. Avery's mission report on the Raider Factory. Excellent work.

There's still an open question as to whether the appearance of these Raiders was somehow caused by our presence, or is coincidental to it.
entries.translation:
I just read Lt. Avery's mission report on the Raider Factory. Excellent work.

There's still an open question as to whether the appearance of these Raiders was somehow caused by our presence, or is coincidental to it.

entries.original:
But the important thing is that the threat is less pressing.

Again, good work by you and your crew.
entries.translation:
But the important thing is that the threat is less pressing.

Again, good work by you and your crew.

entries.original: Thank you, sir.
entries.translation: Thank you, sir.

entries.original: Battle Remains
entries.translation: Battle Remains

entries.original:
The remains of a fairly recent battle between the Red Raider ships and some unknown victim are scattered over a wide area.

Some of the wreckage has been salvaged, but whoever cleaned up either was in a hurry or couldn't haul much. There's a fair amount of valuable resources left.
entries.translation:
The remains of a fairly recent battle between the Red Raider ships and some unknown victim are scattered over a wide area.

Some of the wreckage has been salvaged, but whoever cleaned up either was in a hurry or couldn't haul much. There's a fair amount of valuable resources left.

entries.original: Battleground
entries.translation: Battleground

entries.original:
The wreckage of dozens of craft shows this valley was the site of a battle years ago.

The most valuable materials have already been stripped away, but there are still some hard to access resources that the lander's mining equipment is able to extract.

[CREW_TACTICS] notes that the positioning suggests the defenders were protecting a particular area of low tactical value.
entries.translation:
The wreckage of dozens of craft shows this valley was the site of a battle years ago.

The most valuable materials have already been stripped away, but there are still some hard to access resources that the lander's mining equipment is able to extract.

[CREW_TACTICS] notes that the positioning suggests the defenders were protecting a particular area of low tactical value.

entries.original: Have the team search the area that [CREW_TACTICS] identified.
entries.translation: Have the team search the area that [CREW_TACTICS] identified.

entries.original:
The entrance to a narrow cave is hidden behind a rock outcropping that, from more than a few meters away, seems perfectly flush with the cliff wall.

It seems this secret redoubt was well supplied. While most of the equipment was evacuated along with whoever the inhabitants were, the cave had a small Chiralite reactor.
entries.translation:
The entrance to a narrow cave is hidden behind a rock outcropping that, from more than a few meters away, seems perfectly flush with the cliff wall.

It seems this secret redoubt was well supplied. While most of the equipment was evacuated along with whoever the inhabitants were, the cave had a small Chiralite reactor.

entries.original: Despite an exhaustive search, nothing is found.
entries.translation: Despite an exhaustive search, nothing is found.

entries.original: Have the team return to the ship, for now.
entries.translation: Have the team return to the ship, for now.

entries.original: Bauxite Cliffs
entries.translation: Bauxite Cliffs

entries.original:
The anomaly turns out to be some unusually high bauxite deposits embedded in an exposed cliff face.

The lander's refiner is able to extract a modest amount of aluminum.
entries.translation:
The anomaly turns out to be some unusually high bauxite deposits embedded in an exposed cliff face.

The lander's refiner is able to extract a modest amount of aluminum.

entries.original: Crash Sphere
entries.translation: Crash Sphere

entries.original:
The anomaly is a Titanium crash sphere, designed to slow and protect a small survival capsule during an emergency landing. 

It worked perfectly in this case, but the occupant must have sustained critical injuries prior to ejection.
entries.translation:
The anomaly is a Titanium crash sphere, designed to slow and protect a small survival capsule during an emergency landing. 

It worked perfectly in this case, but the occupant must have sustained critical injuries prior to ejection.

entries.original:
The body has been reduced to little more than a skeleton by the local microfauna, so all the team is able to ascertain is that they were a biped with two arm-like appendages and three ocular cavities.

A distress beacon stopped broadcasting some time ago, but some snippets of the message is recovered by the universal translator:

"... Devout attack group ... course to avoid retrace ... drone production site ...”
entries.translation:
The body has been reduced to little more than a skeleton by the local microfauna, so all the team is able to ascertain is that they were a biped with two arm-like appendages and three ocular cavities.

A distress beacon stopped broadcasting some time ago, but some snippets of the message is recovered by the universal translator:

"... Devout attack group ... course to avoid retrace ... drone production site ...”

entries.original: The Emissary
entries.translation: The Emissary

entries.original:
This planet was home to a late pre-industrial civilization in the last 300-800 years, based on radiological dating. A mere blink in geologic time scales.

There are plentiful sources of texts for the universal translator: a dominant theme is the imminent return of a celestial "Emissary". Descriptions of it vary, although a consistent element is a long blue trailing veil, suggesting it could be a comet.
entries.translation:
This planet was home to a late pre-industrial civilization in the last 300-800 years, based on radiological dating. A mere blink in geologic time scales.

There are plentiful sources of texts for the universal translator: a dominant theme is the imminent return of a celestial "Emissary". Descriptions of it vary, although a consistent element is a long blue trailing veil, suggesting it could be a comet.

entries.original:
The latest surviving texts are confusing, making it difficult to discern between religious beliefs and scientific observation.

The textual record is incomplete, but it appears the civilization's collapse was very close to the arrival of the "Emissary".
entries.translation:
The latest surviving texts are confusing, making it difficult to discern between religious beliefs and scientific observation.

The textual record is incomplete, but it appears the civilization's collapse was very close to the arrival of the "Emissary".

entries.original: There was a dramatic polarization of the culture as to whether it was a good or bad omen. Linguistic-conflict symbols suggest the culture might have been starting to collapse before the 'Emissary' arrived.
entries.translation: There was a dramatic polarization of the culture as to whether it was a good or bad omen. Linguistic-conflict symbols suggest the culture might have been starting to collapse before the 'Emissary' arrived.

entries.original: Discarded Cylinders
entries.translation: Discarded Cylinders

entries.original:
A cluster of discarded cylinders with curious bright markings lie next to a portable aluminum broadcast antenna.

The antenna, which is solar powered, is still broadcasting.
entries.translation:
A cluster of discarded cylinders with curious bright markings lie next to a portable aluminum broadcast antenna.

The antenna, which is solar powered, is still broadcasting.

entries.original: Translate the broadcast.
entries.translation: Translate the broadcast.

entries.original:
*"(possible expletive) didn't realize activation started as soon as the seal was broken. If they're not familiar with guild seals, opening one makes some sense to check what you had. But why all? After the first started glowing I'd at least think before opening the next one.

"Second Legion would've known better. I still have the verification report certifying late Fallen Empire. There's probably no market for inert nanites, but I'll bring them with me. I'm not sticking around to disappoint the buyer."*
entries.translation:
*"(possible expletive) didn't realize activation started as soon as the seal was broken. If they're not familiar with guild seals, opening one makes some sense to check what you had. But why all? After the first started glowing I'd at least think before opening the next one.

"Second Legion would've known better. I still have the verification report certifying late Fallen Empire. There's probably no market for inert nanites, but I'll bring them with me. I'm not sticking around to disappoint the buyer."*

entries.original: Ferrous Deposits
entries.translation: Ferrous Deposits

entries.original:
The anomaly detected from orbit turns out to be a mild magnetic field generated by concentrated ferrous minerals.

Not valuable in themselves, sometimes they mark deposits of more valuable ore.
entries.translation:
The anomaly detected from orbit turns out to be a mild magnetic field generated by concentrated ferrous minerals.

Not valuable in themselves, sometimes they mark deposits of more valuable ore.

entries.original: Have [CREW_ASTRO] direct the search for mineral deposits.
entries.translation: Have [CREW_ASTRO] direct the search for mineral deposits.

entries.original: Jackpot! There's a vein of platinum just below the surface.
entries.translation: Jackpot! There's a vein of platinum just below the surface.

entries.original: The team locates a few easily extractable deposits of Yttrium.
entries.translation: The team locates a few easily extractable deposits of Yttrium.

entries.original: Near the deposit's periphery [CREW_ASTRO] notices chunks of bauxite, some of which are rich enough to allow easy aluminum extraction.
entries.translation: Near the deposit's periphery [CREW_ASTRO] notices chunks of bauxite, some of which are rich enough to allow easy aluminum extraction.

entries.original: Forbidden Planet
entries.translation: Forbidden Planet

entries.original:
The lander touches down a few hundred meters from an enormous pyramid. Its sides are segmented into irregular protrusions.

Penetrating radar shows there is some interior cavities, but no obvious way in.

The team spends a considerable amount of time circling the pyramid and investigating its various facets before [CREW_OBSERVATION] notices an opening in a face that the team had definitely investigated before.
entries.translation:
The lander touches down a few hundred meters from an enormous pyramid. Its sides are segmented into irregular protrusions.

Penetrating radar shows there is some interior cavities, but no obvious way in.

The team spends a considerable amount of time circling the pyramid and investigating its various facets before [CREW_OBSERVATION] notices an opening in a face that the team had definitely investigated before.

entries.original: Examination of the door reveals that it possesses sensitive hydraulic levers that expand at a certain equilibrium of temperature and pressure in the environment.
entries.translation: Examination of the door reveals that it possesses sensitive hydraulic levers that expand at a certain equilibrium of temperature and pressure in the environment.

entries.original:
The pyramid's interior is quite small relative to the outside.

The team finds displays of various relics suggesting a juxtaposition of pre-industrial civilization without electrical or advanced power supplies, yet whose artifacts have an incredibly high level of engineering and mathematical precision. 

One item in particular has incredible detail.
entries.translation:
The pyramid's interior is quite small relative to the outside.

The team finds displays of various relics suggesting a juxtaposition of pre-industrial civilization without electrical or advanced power supplies, yet whose artifacts have an incredibly high level of engineering and mathematical precision. 

One item in particular has incredible detail.

entries.original: Gold Atoll
entries.translation: Gold Atoll

entries.original:
This oceanic world has higher than average concentrations of gold, but distributed so evenly that harvesting any amount would be impractical.

One small atoll, however, is naturally placed so its lagoon acts as a natural gold panner in the ocean currents.
entries.translation:
This oceanic world has higher than average concentrations of gold, but distributed so evenly that harvesting any amount would be impractical.

One small atoll, however, is naturally placed so its lagoon acts as a natural gold panner in the ocean currents.

entries.original: Titanium Ice Age
entries.translation: Titanium Ice Age

entries.original:
[CREW_ASTRO] notes that several million years ago this frozen planet experienced an unusual warm period. During this period, a short-lived civilization progressed to the equivalence of our late iron age.

They were more advanced in some areas, leading to the production of some Titanium artifacts, some of which survived till today.
entries.translation:
[CREW_ASTRO] notes that several million years ago this frozen planet experienced an unusual warm period. During this period, a short-lived civilization progressed to the equivalence of our late iron age.

They were more advanced in some areas, leading to the production of some Titanium artifacts, some of which survived till today.

entries.original: Iridium Upheaval
entries.translation: Iridium Upheaval

entries.original: Eons ago, some geologic event thrust iridium deposits up to the surface. Wind and erosion forces have carried away all but the hardest stone, leaving a few rich nodes.
entries.translation: Eons ago, some geologic event thrust iridium deposits up to the surface. Wind and erosion forces have carried away all but the hardest stone, leaving a few rich nodes.

entries.original: Tiny Bubbles
entries.translation: Tiny Bubbles

entries.original:
The anomaly is a small cluster of soft opaque bubbles, no larger than one's fist.

[CREW_BIOMED] is excited when analysis shows the bubbles contain oxygen gas. They seem to be formed by a bacteria that uses sunlight to breakdown silicon dioxide. A second, symbiotic organism traps the oxygen for its own respiration. Neither organism appears to be sentient.

They suggest taking one of the organisms for analysis.
entries.translation:
The anomaly is a small cluster of soft opaque bubbles, no larger than one's fist.

[CREW_BIOMED] is excited when analysis shows the bubbles contain oxygen gas. They seem to be formed by a bacteria that uses sunlight to breakdown silicon dioxide. A second, symbiotic organism traps the oxygen for its own respiration. Neither organism appears to be sentient.

They suggest taking one of the organisms for analysis.

entries.original: Have [CREW_BIOMED] attempt to extract one of the bubbles.
entries.translation: Have [CREW_BIOMED] attempt to extract one of the bubbles.

entries.original: The operation is a success. Once inside the lander, additional analysis reveals a biological process never before seen.
entries.translation: The operation is a success. Once inside the lander, additional analysis reveals a biological process never before seen.

entries.original:
As the team attempts to remove one of the bubbles from its regolith base, it erupts.

A caustic chemical splatters onto [CREW_BIOMED]'s helmet and begins "attacking" the polyglass face plate. The crew barely makes it back to the lander before they asphyxiate.
entries.translation:
As the team attempts to remove one of the bubbles from its regolith base, it erupts.

A caustic chemical splatters onto [CREW_BIOMED]'s helmet and begins "attacking" the polyglass face plate. The crew barely makes it back to the lander before they asphyxiate.

entries.original: An unknown lifeform is too much risk to bring aboard. Have the team return to the ship, for now.
entries.translation: An unknown lifeform is too much risk to bring aboard. Have the team return to the ship, for now.

entries.original:
The cluster of soft opaque bubbles remains as before.

[CREW_BIOMED] maintains that analyzing them could yield new discoveries.
entries.translation:
The cluster of soft opaque bubbles remains as before.

[CREW_BIOMED] maintains that analyzing them could yield new discoveries.

entries.original: Empty Outpost
entries.translation: Empty Outpost

entries.original: This structure appears to be an intermittently used outpost with cramped living quarters and a communications array.
entries.translation: This structure appears to be an intermittently used outpost with cramped living quarters and a communications array.

entries.original: Search the structure.
entries.translation: Search the structure.

entries.original:
There's nothing really of value, but [CREW_ENGINEERING] notices that the waste recycler is jammed with a magnetic memory disc. They're able to recover several log messages regarding mineral transfers and one interesting entry:

"...expect increased raw material orders from both Nimion and Kyrnan factions by *(unintelligible)*. I recommend the *(unintelligible)* system. Easy access and low profile. Not well known to other *(unintelligible)*"

The message is followed by what appears to be another set of gateway coordinates.
entries.translation:
There's nothing really of value, but [CREW_ENGINEERING] notices that the waste recycler is jammed with a magnetic memory disc. They're able to recover several log messages regarding mineral transfers and one interesting entry:

"...expect increased raw material orders from both Nimion and Kyrnan factions by *(unintelligible)*. I recommend the *(unintelligible)* system. Easy access and low profile. Not well known to other *(unintelligible)*"

The message is followed by what appears to be another set of gateway coordinates.

entries.original: Raider Debris
entries.translation: Raider Debris

entries.original:
Wreckage from a ship with the now familiar red and yellow markings is scattered across the desert floor.

Besides some aluminum, the debris is mostly unremarkable.
entries.translation:
Wreckage from a ship with the now familiar red and yellow markings is scattered across the desert floor.

Besides some aluminum, the debris is mostly unremarkable.

entries.original: Based on this debris, these red ships are likely autonomous drones.
entries.translation: Based on this debris, these red ships are likely autonomous drones.

entries.original: Drone Factory
entries.translation: Drone Factory

entries.original:
What looked like a small spaceport from low orbit turn out to be a fully automated manufacturing facility. Tracked robots carry ore from the nearby hills into a refinery connected to the main structure.

A partially assembled "red raider" drone is being assembled on the launch pad.
entries.translation:
What looked like a small spaceport from low orbit turn out to be a fully automated manufacturing facility. Tracked robots carry ore from the nearby hills into a refinery connected to the main structure.

A partially assembled "red raider" drone is being assembled on the launch pad.

entries.original: Judging from the erosion patterns around the ore mines, this place was idle for a long time and only recently restarted activities.
entries.translation: Judging from the erosion patterns around the ore mines, this place was idle for a long time and only recently restarted activities.

entries.original: Have the team investigate the facility, carefully.
entries.translation: Have the team investigate the facility, carefully.

entries.original:
[CREW_TACTICS] reconnoiters the area and plans out a path that will allow a quick retreat.

But the caution seems to have been unnecessary: the facility oddly has no ground defenses. After gaining entry, the team is able to explore freely.
entries.translation:
[CREW_TACTICS] reconnoiters the area and plans out a path that will allow a quick retreat.

But the caution seems to have been unnecessary: the facility oddly has no ground defenses. After gaining entry, the team is able to explore freely.

entries.original:
The complex is old, but well maintained by robots of scarce sentience who ignore the team's movements. From inside, they can see processed ore turned into advanced ship components.

With the team's unfettered access to the systems, it seems like it should be simple to shut down production.
entries.translation:
The complex is old, but well maintained by robots of scarce sentience who ignore the team's movements. From inside, they can see processed ore turned into advanced ship components.

With the team's unfettered access to the systems, it seems like it should be simple to shut down production.

entries.original: Shut down the facility.
entries.translation: Shut down the facility.

entries.original:
[CREW_ENGINEERING] identifies the main controller systems. After a bit of tinkering, the machine stops.

With production halted, the team is able to help themselves to the processed ore.
entries.translation:
[CREW_ENGINEERING] identifies the main controller systems. After a bit of tinkering, the machine stops.

With production halted, the team is able to help themselves to the processed ore.

entries.original: Have the team return to the ship, for now.
entries.translation: Have the team return to the ship, for now.

entries.original: The facility continues to turn crushed rock ore into flying red robots of destruction.
entries.translation: The facility continues to turn crushed rock ore into flying red robots of destruction.

entries.original: Starliner Wreck
entries.translation: Starliner Wreck

entries.original: The anomaly detected from orbit is the wreckage of a starliner. The impact with the surface destroyed most of the salvage, but in a reinforced hold the team finds several crates of copper and a damaged data log.
entries.translation: The anomaly detected from orbit is the wreckage of a starliner. The impact with the surface destroyed most of the salvage, but in a reinforced hold the team finds several crates of copper and a damaged data log.

entries.original: Analyze the data log.
entries.translation: Analyze the data log.

entries.original:
It's too badly corrupted for the universal translator to form a complete matrix, but it was able to piece together the last few entries:

"... taken delivery of copper ... for the Ermyr to engage ... their absence ... "

"Have been attacked while en route by ... Destroyed two ships, but engines now redlining ... emergency landing ..."
entries.translation:
It's too badly corrupted for the universal translator to form a complete matrix, but it was able to piece together the last few entries:

"... taken delivery of copper ... for the Ermyr to engage ... their absence ... "

"Have been attacked while en route by ... Destroyed two ships, but engines now redlining ... emergency landing ..."

entries.original: Sunken Treasure
entries.translation: Sunken Treasure

entries.original:
In a shallow rocky cove on this oceanic world, the team finds sunken box. Inside are bars of pure gold!

The treasure is an enigma. There are no signs of current or past civilizations on the planet.
entries.translation:
In a shallow rocky cove on this oceanic world, the team finds sunken box. Inside are bars of pure gold!

The treasure is an enigma. There are no signs of current or past civilizations on the planet.

entries.original: Swamped Gunship
entries.translation: Swamped Gunship

entries.original:
There's little of interest on this methane-choked planet. The most advanced lifeform is a grass-like fungus.

But sometime in the last few centuries someone fought over this wet rock, as demonstrated by a half-sunken gunship. While nature has stripped away many of its resources, some turrets still have their Yttrium capacitors.
entries.translation:
There's little of interest on this methane-choked planet. The most advanced lifeform is a grass-like fungus.

But sometime in the last few centuries someone fought over this wet rock, as demonstrated by a half-sunken gunship. While nature has stripped away many of its resources, some turrets still have their Yttrium capacitors.

entries.original: Test Beyond through Ermyr
entries.translation: Test Beyond through Ermyr

entries.original: Forbidden Planet
entries.translation: Forbidden Planet

entries.original: We've encountered a race called the Ermyr who have warned us against landing on a planet they're guarding.
entries.translation: We've encountered a race called the Ermyr who have warned us against landing on a planet they're guarding.

entries.original: Based on information we found in a wrecked ship's logs, we were able to offer the Ermyr payment to fight the Red Raiders.
entries.translation: Based on information we found in a wrecked ship's logs, we were able to offer the Ermyr payment to fight the Red Raiders.

entries.original:
Our transaction with the Ermyr has the convenient side effect of leaving the planet unguarded, something of which they were aware.

This is what we Xenoculturists technically refer to as a "bribe".
entries.translation:
Our transaction with the Ermyr has the convenient side effect of leaving the planet unguarded, something of which they were aware.

This is what we Xenoculturists technically refer to as a "bribe".

entries.original: [CREW_XENOCULTURE] thinks the Ermyr do not seriously expect us not to land on the planet.
entries.translation: [CREW_XENOCULTURE] thinks the Ermyr do not seriously expect us not to land on the planet.

entries.original: I've been reviewing our survey logs. That starliner wreck has a reference to the Ermyr. I think it might have been talking about a bribe.
entries.translation: I've been reviewing our survey logs. That starliner wreck has a reference to the Ermyr. I think it might have been talking about a bribe.

entries.original: Ermyr Motivations
entries.translation: Ermyr Motivations

entries.original: [CREW_XENOCULTURE] thinks the Starliner Wreck we found may have been on its way to bribe the Ermyr with the Copper in its hold.
entries.translation: [CREW_XENOCULTURE] thinks the Starliner Wreck we found may have been on its way to bribe the Ermyr with the Copper in its hold.

entries.original: Test the factory portion of beyond
entries.translation: Test the factory portion of beyond

entries.original: Fixed Gun
entries.translation: Fixed Gun

entries.original: We've found a component for a new type of weapon.
entries.translation: We've found a component for a new type of weapon.

entries.original: If we can find more components we should be able to research building this weapon ourselves.
entries.translation: If we can find more components we should be able to research building this weapon ourselves.

entries.original: If we can find additional parts of this weapon, we'll be able to research building it ourselves.
entries.translation: If we can find additional parts of this weapon, we'll be able to research building it ourselves.

entries.original: We have found enough components that we should be able to research building this weapon.
entries.translation: We have found enough components that we should be able to research building this weapon.

entries.original: Fixed Guns
entries.translation: Fixed Guns

entries.original: The nature of fixed guns makes targeting harder. When a potential target is close to in-range I'll enable the fire tracers which will highlight when a hit is probable.
entries.translation: The nature of fixed guns makes targeting harder. When a potential target is close to in-range I'll enable the fire tracers which will highlight when a hit is probable.

entries.original: Red Raider Region
entries.translation: Red Raider Region

entries.original: We've found a region of space infested with "red raider" ships that attack us on sight.
entries.translation: We've found a region of space infested with "red raider" ships that attack us on sight.

entries.original: These appear to be the same ships we encountered near Celaeno. Cdre. Yu wants us to investigate their source.
entries.translation: These appear to be the same ships we encountered near Celaeno. Cdre. Yu wants us to investigate their source.

entries.original: One of our priorities is to identify the source of these attack ships.
entries.translation: One of our priorities is to identify the source of these attack ships.

entries.original: We've paid the Ermyr to help us deal with these ships.
entries.translation: We've paid the Ermyr to help us deal with these ships.

entries.original: We've discovered an automated production facility that seems responsible for the red raider drones.
entries.translation: We've discovered an automated production facility that seems responsible for the red raider drones.

entries.original:
That's a relief.

Hopefully we'll see fewer of these red raiders now.
entries.translation:
That's a relief.

Hopefully we'll see fewer of these red raiders now.

entries.original: We've deactivated a base that seems to have been the source of the Red Raiders.
entries.translation: We've deactivated a base that seems to have been the source of the Red Raiders.

entries.original: [CREW_TACTICS]'s pre-recorded presentation on Red Raider tactics is now available on Celaeno-Mil.
entries.translation: [CREW_TACTICS]'s pre-recorded presentation on Red Raider tactics is now available on Celaeno-Mil.

entries.original: [SHIP_NAME]
entries.translation: [SHIP_NAME]

entries.original: I've been analyzing the Red Raider attacks. Based on their arrival warp signatures, think I see a tactical pattern. I've marked on our map where I expect their main defense to be.
entries.translation: I've been analyzing the Red Raider attacks. Based on their arrival warp signatures, think I see a tactical pattern. I've marked on our map where I expect their main defense to be.

entries.original: Raider Patterns
entries.translation: Raider Patterns

entries.original: Through analysis of the Raider's attack patterns, we've located a likely region of origin near [COORD]
entries.translation: Through analysis of the Raider's attack patterns, we've located a likely region of origin near [COORD]

entries.original: Enigmatic Shapes
entries.translation: Enigmatic Shapes

entries.original: An intricate set of nested, movable polyhedra.
entries.translation: An intricate set of nested, movable polyhedra.

entries.original: Upon deeper analysis, there are movable parts within movable parts, down to a remarkably small scale. There seem to be rules governing how the interlocking shapes can move, like a puzzle game.
entries.translation: Upon deeper analysis, there are movable parts within movable parts, down to a remarkably small scale. There seem to be rules governing how the interlocking shapes can move, like a puzzle game.

entries.original: Unsealed Cylinder
entries.translation: Unsealed Cylinder

entries.original: A cylindrical container, opened at one end, with some interesting decorations.
entries.translation: A cylindrical container, opened at one end, with some interesting decorations.

entries.original: The decorations are connected to an array of interior sensors with a cryptographic network. Possibly a mechanism to visually ensure the contents are not tampered or replaced.
entries.translation: The decorations are connected to an array of interior sensors with a cryptographic network. Possibly a mechanism to visually ensure the contents are not tampered or replaced.

entries.original: Raider Coil Device
entries.translation: Raider Coil Device

entries.original: An energy coil found in the debris of one of the raider ships.
entries.translation: An energy coil found in the debris of one of the raider ships.

entries.original: It's a warp telemetry beacon, probably used to coordinate ship movements from a central location.
entries.translation: It's a warp telemetry beacon, probably used to coordinate ship movements from a central location.

entries.original: Crash Sphere
entries.translation: Crash Sphere

entries.original: The structure expands on ejection into an optimal geometry for both dissipating friction heat and absorbing impact energy.
entries.translation: The structure expands on ejection into an optimal geometry for both dissipating friction heat and absorbing impact energy.

entries.original: Advanced Fabrication
entries.translation: Advanced Fabrication

entries.original: The process that creates the drone parts is very advanced. It's probably capable of automating almost any machine production.
entries.translation: The process that creates the drone parts is very advanced. It's probably capable of automating almost any machine production.

entries.original: Bronze Luddites
entries.translation: Bronze Luddites

entries.original: Most cultures either flourish or collapse quickly after alien contact. The fact that this one did not gives a unique insight into xenocultural permanence.
entries.translation: Most cultures either flourish or collapse quickly after alien contact. The fact that this one did not gives a unique insight into xenocultural permanence.

entries.original: Aerobic Symbiote
entries.translation: Aerobic Symbiote

entries.original: The symbiotic relationship between the two lifeforms suggests a more energy efficient route to extract oxygen from a highly abundant compound.
entries.translation: The symbiotic relationship between the two lifeforms suggests a more energy efficient route to extract oxygen from a highly abundant compound.

entries.original: Pyramid Mechanics
entries.translation: Pyramid Mechanics

entries.original: The pyramid's door relies on a temperature differential with the outside. Gradual warming causes hydraulics to expand, opening the door. Perhaps it was designed to open automatically at dawn?
entries.translation: The pyramid's door relies on a temperature differential with the outside. Gradual warming causes hydraulics to expand, opening the door. Perhaps it was designed to open automatically at dawn?

entries.original: Test
entries.translation: Test

entries.original: Advanced Plasma Cruiser
entries.translation: Advanced Plasma Cruiser

entries.original: Advanced Gunship Explorer
entries.translation: Advanced Gunship Explorer

entries.original: Gunship Cruiser
entries.translation: Gunship Cruiser

entries.original: Gunship Explorer
entries.translation: Gunship Explorer

entries.original: Gunship Scout
entries.translation: Gunship Scout

entries.original: Frigate Explorer
entries.translation: Frigate Explorer

entries.original: Laser Cruiser
entries.translation: Laser Cruiser

entries.original: Laser Explorer
entries.translation: Laser Explorer

entries.original: Missile Cruiser
entries.translation: Missile Cruiser

entries.original: Missile Explorer
entries.translation: Missile Explorer

entries.original: Missile Scout
entries.translation: Missile Scout

entries.original: Plasma Cruiser
entries.translation: Plasma Cruiser

entries.original: Plasma Explorer
entries.translation: Plasma Explorer

entries.original: Plasma Explorer
entries.translation: Plasma Explorer

entries.original: Plasma Scout
entries.translation: Plasma Scout

entries.original: Advanced Plasma Scout
entries.translation: Advanced Plasma Scout

entries.original: Shielded Explorer
entries.translation: Shielded Explorer

entries.original: Void Explorer
entries.translation: Void Explorer

entries.original: Void Scout
entries.translation: Void Scout

entries.original:
Lt. Milton has used some resources from our pact with the Goryr to upgrade our combat capabilities.

We've also had the benefit of the tech upgrades you've researched. The Devout won't want to mess with us again.
entries.translation:
Lt. Milton has used some resources from our pact with the Goryr to upgrade our combat capabilities.

We've also had the benefit of the tech upgrades you've researched. The Devout won't want to mess with us again.

entries.original: Greetings, [PLAYER_NAME], how may we assist our new allies?
entries.translation: Greetings, [PLAYER_NAME], how may we assist our new allies?

entries.original: We are glad to be of assistance to our ally [PLAYER_NAME].
entries.translation: We are glad to be of assistance to our ally [PLAYER_NAME].

entries.original:
We come with a warning.

Rumors have reached us that the Devout are increasing their attention in your direction. They have even incorporated [SHIP_NAME] into the latest incarnation of their eschatology.
entries.translation:
We come with a warning.

Rumors have reached us that the Devout are increasing their attention in your direction. They have even incorporated [SHIP_NAME] into the latest incarnation of their eschatology.

entries.original: How flattering of them.
entries.translation: How flattering of them.

entries.original:
It does imply that the absolute value of their respect for you is high.

But I do not think flattery is their intent.
entries.translation:
It does imply that the absolute value of their respect for you is high.

But I do not think flattery is their intent.

entries.original:
It is a clever stratagem they use.

They have observed your interest in the Remnant Artifacts. Their sermons are now subtly changed to connect the Talonian and [PLAYER_NAME].

Now your investigations conveniently fulfill fresh prophesies and their converts grow.
entries.translation:
It is a clever stratagem they use.

They have observed your interest in the Remnant Artifacts. Their sermons are now subtly changed to connect the Talonian and [PLAYER_NAME].

Now your investigations conveniently fulfill fresh prophesies and their converts grow.

entries.original:
Know now that you are the focus of the attention, they will pursue you with fanaticism.

And do not assume their irrational superstitions means they are fools.
entries.translation:
Know now that you are the focus of the attention, they will pursue you with fanaticism.

And do not assume their irrational superstitions means they are fools.

entries.original: Thanks for the heads-up.
entries.translation: Thanks for the heads-up.

entries.original:
You are welcome. You share our interest in knowledge and enmity in the Devout. 

We are hearing reports that their ranks are growing even faster. And with new converts, they gain access to superior technologies.
entries.translation:
You are welcome. You share our interest in knowledge and enmity in the Devout. 

We are hearing reports that their ranks are growing even faster. And with new converts, they gain access to superior technologies.

entries.original: That sounds ominous.
entries.translation: That sounds ominous.

entries.original: Our reaction as well, which is why we hurried to seek you out.
entries.translation: Our reaction as well, which is why we hurried to seek you out.

entries.original:
Given the increased threats facing us from multiple factions, I have signed a limited alliance with the Goryr. 

Despite some questions about their motivations, it is the least bad option available.
entries.translation:
Given the increased threats facing us from multiple factions, I have signed a limited alliance with the Goryr. 

Despite some questions about their motivations, it is the least bad option available.

entries.original:
We'll be providing them with redacted logs from [SHIP_NAME]. They will continue to provide information related to this universe and the Remnants.

They have also given us a loan of some resources for upgrades to be repaid at a future date.
entries.translation:
We'll be providing them with redacted logs from [SHIP_NAME]. They will continue to provide information related to this universe and the Remnants.

They have also given us a loan of some resources for upgrades to be repaid at a future date.

entries.original: We need all the friends we can get, and they already know Celaeno's location.
entries.translation: We need all the friends we can get, and they already know Celaeno's location.

entries.original:
My thinking as well.

Even if we find other potential allies in this region, I don't want to advertise where we are. Or how few ships we currently have.
entries.translation:
My thinking as well.

Even if we find other potential allies in this region, I don't want to advertise where we are. Or how few ships we currently have.

entries.original:
I've set aside some of the initial resources the Goryr have delivered for [SHIP_NAME].

Is there anything else?
entries.translation:
I've set aside some of the initial resources the Goryr have delivered for [SHIP_NAME].

Is there anything else?

entries.original: I don't like it. They seem a bit too generous. Why?
entries.translation: I don't like it. They seem a bit too generous. Why?

entries.original:
They are not just investing in an alliance with two Starcom ships. They are investing in an eventual alliance with all of Starcom once you help re-open the wormhole.

But your concern is not unwarranted.
entries.translation:
They are not just investing in an alliance with two Starcom ships. They are investing in an eventual alliance with all of Starcom once you help re-open the wormhole.

But your concern is not unwarranted.

entries.original:
I suppose it was only a matter of time before these newer Red Raiders launched an attack.

While I suspect The Aletheia and Celaeno could have handled them, it was lucky [SHIP_NAME] was nearby.

This emphasizes the importance of re-opening that wormhole to bring in more support. We're all counting on you.
entries.translation:
I suppose it was only a matter of time before these newer Red Raiders launched an attack.

While I suspect The Aletheia and Celaeno could have handled them, it was lucky [SHIP_NAME] was nearby.

This emphasizes the importance of re-opening that wormhole to bring in more support. We're all counting on you.

entries.original: Is there anything else?
entries.translation: Is there anything else?

entries.original: WARNING: LAST_TALONIAN.DERELICT not set already, setting for test.
entries.translation: WARNING: LAST_TALONIAN.DERELICT not set already, setting for test.

entries.original: Unknown contacts detected on LHR, condition orange.
entries.translation: Unknown contacts detected on LHR, condition orange.

entries.original: Command
entries.translation: Command

entries.original: The Aletheia has new crew positions available. Applicant review will be conducted during next resupply.
entries.translation: The Aletheia has new crew positions available. Applicant review will be conducted during next resupply.

entries.original: Aletheia
entries.translation: Aletheia

entries.original: All personnel will be required to attend two briefings on changes to Celaeno combat drills. Your section head will schedule, but it is your responsibility to know the drills by your next review.
entries.translation: All personnel will be required to attend two briefings on changes to Celaeno combat drills. Your section head will schedule, but it is your responsibility to know the drills by your next review.

entries.original: Logistics
entries.translation: Logistics

entries.original: The Aletheia
entries.translation: The Aletheia

entries.original: The Aletheia
entries.translation: The Aletheia

entries.original: The Aletheia
entries.translation: The Aletheia

entries.original: The Aletheia
entries.translation: The Aletheia

entries.original: Celaeno
entries.translation: Celaeno

entries.original:
Our little codex puzzle has divulged another set of gateway coordinates. 

They're not too far from that Cepheid variable star Rama has been going on about. I agree with Cdre. Yu that sending [SHIP_NAME] on a long trek to investigate would have been a waste of resources. 

Now perhaps the detour could be justified.
entries.translation:
Our little codex puzzle has divulged another set of gateway coordinates. 

They're not too far from that Cepheid variable star Rama has been going on about. I agree with Cdre. Yu that sending [SHIP_NAME] on a long trek to investigate would have been a waste of resources. 

Now perhaps the detour could be justified.

entries.original: We've found an item that my team thinks you might have some information on. Do you recognize it?
entries.translation: We've found an item that my team thinks you might have some information on. Do you recognize it?

entries.original:
Yes!

This is making sense. There's an illustration attributed to The Devout that looks like a star in a star lance. But I think it was actually this item-- the cradle of which is made to look like the part of the lance that contains the star.

The sphere contains a map, although possibly not literally. Early Empire texts are a bit allegorical.
entries.translation:
Yes!

This is making sense. There's an illustration attributed to The Devout that looks like a star in a star lance. But I think it was actually this item-- the cradle of which is made to look like the part of the lance that contains the star.

The sphere contains a map, although possibly not literally. Early Empire texts are a bit allegorical.

entries.original:
There were some equations associated with the illustration. We thought it might be more gateway coordinates, but Rama said no.

The data is still in the lab's computer. Most of the analysis has already been done-- with this piece you might be able to complete.
entries.translation:
There were some equations associated with the illustration. We thought it might be more gateway coordinates, but Rama said no.

The data is still in the lab's computer. Most of the analysis has already been done-- with this piece you might be able to complete.

entries.original: We found this artifact. Capt. Dolson suggested it might be connected to some equations she gave you?
entries.translation: We found this artifact. Capt. Dolson suggested it might be connected to some equations she gave you?

entries.original: Hmmm,
entries.translation: Hmmm,

entries.original:
Our sensors have picked up an unusual multi-modal Cepheid variable dwarf star.

These are very rare in our universe and we've never had a chance to study one up close.

I suggested to Cdre. Yu that it would be an excellent scientific opportunity if [SHIP_NAME] investigated it.
entries.translation:
Our sensors have picked up an unusual multi-modal Cepheid variable dwarf star.

These are very rare in our universe and we've never had a chance to study one up close.

I suggested to Cdre. Yu that it would be an excellent scientific opportunity if [SHIP_NAME] investigated it.

entries.original: What did he say?
entries.translation: What did he say?

entries.original:
He did not seem particularly receptive to the idea.

His words were "If it won't lead us to more Remnant artifacts or re-opening the wormhole, I don't want [PLAYER_NAME] wasting valuable time on your academic research."

Or something to that effect.
entries.translation:
He did not seem particularly receptive to the idea.

His words were "If it won't lead us to more Remnant artifacts or re-opening the wormhole, I don't want [PLAYER_NAME] wasting valuable time on your academic research."

Or something to that effect.

entries.original: Maybe the Remnants really like these Cephalopod Vagrant stars.
entries.translation: Maybe the Remnants really like these Cephalopod Vagrant stars.

entries.original:
That's not what they're called, but yes, that was my thinking.

We know *nothing* about whoever made these artifacts, except they were exceptionally intelligent.

I'm exceptionally intelligent and I'm very interested in the Cepheid Variable star.
entries.translation:
That's not what they're called, but yes, that was my thinking.

We know *nothing* about whoever made these artifacts, except they were exceptionally intelligent.

I'm exceptionally intelligent and I'm very interested in the Cepheid Variable star.

entries.original:
I'll transmit the coordinates to Lt. Avery.

I should mention that one of Cdre. Yu's objections was that the star is not particularly close to any discovered gateway.
entries.translation:
I'll transmit the coordinates to Lt. Avery.

I should mention that one of Cdre. Yu's objections was that the star is not particularly close to any discovered gateway.

entries.original: That sounds fairly definitive. I don't think ignoring Yu will help my career.
entries.translation: That sounds fairly definitive. I don't think ignoring Yu will help my career.

entries.original:
Yes, I know, chain of command and so forth. 

Well if you do happen to find yourself near it, make sure to get close enough with [SHIP_NAME] to get some readings.
entries.translation:
Yes, I know, chain of command and so forth. 

Well if you do happen to find yourself near it, make sure to get close enough with [SHIP_NAME] to get some readings.

entries.original: I have not had an opportunity to review [SHIP_NAME]'s logs. But I gathered from Yu's shouting at me about the chain of command that you investigated the Cepheid variable star? And found something interesting? I was only listening to the bits about science, which were sparse.
entries.translation: I have not had an opportunity to review [SHIP_NAME]'s logs. But I gathered from Yu's shouting at me about the chain of command that you investigated the Cepheid variable star? And found something interesting? I was only listening to the bits about science, which were sparse.

entries.original: It turned out to be a massive Remnant artifact whose rotation blocks out the light of a star.
entries.translation: It turned out to be a massive Remnant artifact whose rotation blocks out the light of a star.

entries.original: Not a Cepheid at all then? Disappointing.
entries.translation: Not a Cepheid at all then? Disappointing.

entries.original: Did you miss the bit about the Remnant Artifact that's engulfed a star?
entries.translation: Did you miss the bit about the Remnant Artifact that's engulfed a star?

entries.original:
It's already been well established that objects in front of light cast shadows. 

I understand that it's a mysterious enigma from an ancient civilization and such, but it isn't giving me new information. Perhaps you can coax it to release some interesting particles like that other thing.
entries.translation:
It's already been well established that objects in front of light cast shadows. 

I understand that it's a mysterious enigma from an ancient civilization and such, but it isn't giving me new information. Perhaps you can coax it to release some interesting particles like that other thing.

entries.original:
Capt. Dolson alerted me about the developments regarding the so-called Starlance.

I have obviously not had time to examine the results of the most recent research, but at a glance they are promising. Your team observed that the structure has some similarities to our wormhole stabilizers.

It is Cdre. Yu's hope that activating it will re-open the connection back to our own universe.
entries.translation:
Capt. Dolson alerted me about the developments regarding the so-called Starlance.

I have obviously not had time to examine the results of the most recent research, but at a glance they are promising. Your team observed that the structure has some similarities to our wormhole stabilizers.

It is Cdre. Yu's hope that activating it will re-open the connection back to our own universe.

entries.original:
But looking at the equations for the artifact in new light, they seem odd. It may simply be our limited understanding of Remnant technology, but I would urge caution.

[SHIP_NAME] has exceeded my expectations, it would be a shame to lose it.
entries.translation:
But looking at the equations for the artifact in new light, they seem odd. It may simply be our limited understanding of Remnant technology, but I would urge caution.

[SHIP_NAME] has exceeded my expectations, it would be a shame to lose it.

entries.original: Was exceeding your expectations that high of a bar?
entries.translation: Was exceeding your expectations that high of a bar?

entries.original: More of an H bar, but you and your crew have made useful contributions to our understanding of this universe.
entries.translation: More of an H bar, but you and your crew have made useful contributions to our understanding of this universe.

entries.original:
A good commander can admit when he was wrong and I like to think I'm a good commander. 

Dr. Rama's request to investigate the "Cepheid" was right. But she was wrong to ignore my orders and try to inject her priorities above mine. Unfortunately, I'm a bit constrained in my ability to punish her.
entries.translation:
A good commander can admit when he was wrong and I like to think I'm a good commander. 

Dr. Rama's request to investigate the "Cepheid" was right. But she was wrong to ignore my orders and try to inject her priorities above mine. Unfortunately, I'm a bit constrained in my ability to punish her.

entries.original:
Ignoring her insubordination, it's an important discovery.

Captain Dolson and her team believe there's a connection between this "Starlance" as she calls it, the Polyhedral artifact, and the wormhole.

Your new top priority is determining what the Starlance does and how to operate it.

And one more thing...
entries.translation:
Ignoring her insubordination, it's an important discovery.

Captain Dolson and her team believe there's a connection between this "Starlance" as she calls it, the Polyhedral artifact, and the wormhole.

Your new top priority is determining what the Starlance does and how to operate it.

And one more thing...

entries.original: Yes?
entries.translation: Yes?

entries.original: If Dr. Rama tries to re-prioritize your objectives again, let me know.
entries.translation: If Dr. Rama tries to re-prioritize your objectives again, let me know.

entries.original: Understood.
entries.translation: Understood.

entries.original: Flash Freeze
entries.translation: Flash Freeze

entries.original:
Hundreds, or perhaps even thousands of years ago, this planet was host to thriving civilization, perhaps not too much behind our own in technology.

A sudden change in climate brought that to an end. Much of the civilization is now buried under kilometers of glaciers, but a few elevated settlements offer resources they no longer have a need for.
entries.translation:
Hundreds, or perhaps even thousands of years ago, this planet was host to thriving civilization, perhaps not too much behind our own in technology.

A sudden change in climate brought that to an end. Much of the civilization is now buried under kilometers of glaciers, but a few elevated settlements offer resources they no longer have a need for.

entries.original: I found a few texts in the ruins that indicate this cataclysm didn't take them by surprise: they were forewarned that their sun would darken. It's unclear if they couldn't prepare or chose not to.
entries.translation: I found a few texts in the ruins that indicate this cataclysm didn't take them by surprise: they were forewarned that their sun would darken. It's unclear if they couldn't prepare or chose not to.

entries.original: Shield Inducers
entries.translation: Shield Inducers

entries.original:
A network of 1200m structures punctuate the surface of this planet.

[CREW_ENGINEERING] believes that they may be transferring energy by warp induction to the station we observed above the planet.

It might be possible to "trick" one of the towers to tell all of them to shut down. But they may have counter-measures.
entries.translation:
A network of 1200m structures punctuate the surface of this planet.

[CREW_ENGINEERING] believes that they may be transferring energy by warp induction to the station we observed above the planet.

It might be possible to "trick" one of the towers to tell all of them to shut down. But they may have counter-measures.

entries.original: This is an oddly inefficient use of their advanced technology. It's like heating a tea kettle with a laser on another planet.
entries.translation: This is an oddly inefficient use of their advanced technology. It's like heating a tea kettle with a laser on another planet.

entries.original: Have [CREW_ENGINEERING] try to shut down the network.
entries.translation: Have [CREW_ENGINEERING] try to shut down the network.

entries.original:
Success!

[CREW_ENGINEERING] reports that they've convinced the structures that the station is no longer in orbit and are no longer projecting energy toward it.
entries.translation:
Success!

[CREW_ENGINEERING] reports that they've convinced the structures that the station is no longer in orbit and are no longer projecting energy toward it.

entries.original:
[CREW_ENGINEERING] spends close to an hour at the ground connections of one of the towers. Suddenly, there is an audible crackle and the tower lights up in electric sparks.

Injured in body and pride, they report the tower has activated its own defense.
entries.translation:
[CREW_ENGINEERING] spends close to an hour at the ground connections of one of the towers. Suddenly, there is an audible crackle and the tower lights up in electric sparks.

Injured in body and pride, they report the tower has activated its own defense.

entries.original:
After another attempt, [CREW_ENGINEERING] admits the security system has reactivated.

At least they avoided the shock this time.
entries.translation:
After another attempt, [CREW_ENGINEERING] admits the security system has reactivated.

At least they avoided the shock this time.

entries.original: Have the team return to the ship, for now.
entries.translation: Have the team return to the ship, for now.

entries.original: The networked structures are still beaming their energy into space.
entries.translation: The networked structures are still beaming their energy into space.

entries.original:
With the station's shields up, the survey team is only able to investigate it from afar.

It's significantly less technologically advanced than most other space vessels we've seen.
entries.translation:
With the station's shields up, the survey team is only able to investigate it from afar.

It's significantly less technologically advanced than most other space vessels we've seen.

entries.original:
The station is uninhabited, although it may have previously had a small crew.

The interior very much looks like a first attempt at space travel: well made, but lacking experience.

Most of the equipment is scientific in nature, collecting basic observations on the nearby star's variations.
entries.translation:
