From [CREW_BIOMED]'s notes on the specific modifications, we also were able to guess at translations for some of the cryptic annotations. Our guess is that some modifications were less unalloyed benefits, but were things the Empire as whole might want, but an individual might not opt-into. A natural deference to the Empire's authority, for example.
entries.translation:
My team has been examining the data [CREW_BIOMED] recovered since the first lab. The Empire not only genetically engineered individuals for specific roles, but also large groups. 

These changes gave advantages for the Empire's operation, and for the individual. A stronger, longer-lived soldier with superior tactical thinking was better for the Empire and more likely to pass on these genes until they became the majority in that species.

From [CREW_BIOMED]'s notes on the specific modifications, we also were able to guess at translations for some of the cryptic annotations. Our guess is that some modifications were less unalloyed benefits, but were things the Empire as whole might want, but an individual might not opt-into. A natural deference to the Empire's authority, for example.

entries.original: Legacy Facility
entries.translation: Legacy Facility

entries.original:
A fortified tunnel at the base of a large mesa was buried centuries ago by a rock slide. In the past few decades, erosion effects have re-exposed it.

The same effects have weathered away the shield plating to the point the team is able to enter without difficulty.
entries.translation:
A fortified tunnel at the base of a large mesa was buried centuries ago by a rock slide. In the past few decades, erosion effects have re-exposed it.

The same effects have weathered away the shield plating to the point the team is able to enter without difficulty.

entries.original:
Deep within, the team finds an old research facility, probably from mid-Empire according to [CREW_XENOCULTURE]. 

After an investigation of the surviving equipment, it seems likely this facility worked in genetic modifications.
entries.translation:
Deep within, the team finds an old research facility, probably from mid-Empire according to [CREW_XENOCULTURE]. 

After an investigation of the surviving equipment, it seems likely this facility worked in genetic modifications.

entries.original: Unfortunately, the genetic materials have degraded to the point that there is no hope in determining the nature of the modifications, or even the species. But a large device connected to the storage units attracts [CREW_BIOMED]'s attention.
entries.translation: Unfortunately, the genetic materials have degraded to the point that there is no hope in determining the nature of the modifications, or even the species. But a large device connected to the storage units attracts [CREW_BIOMED]'s attention.

entries.original: This is another early Empire genetics lab, equipped with another Sequence Transcriber. Combined with the previous data, it is possible to translate the annotations and construct a partial picture of the activities.
entries.translation: This is another early Empire genetics lab, equipped with another Sequence Transcriber. Combined with the previous data, it is possible to translate the annotations and construct a partial picture of the activities.

entries.original: This is another early Imperial genetics lab. Unlike the previous examples, this one operated a mass-production scale, with multiple tunnels radiating out from a central control room, and with each tunnel lines with hundreds of transcribers designed to work in unison.
entries.translation: This is another early Imperial genetics lab. Unlike the previous examples, this one operated a mass-production scale, with multiple tunnels radiating out from a central control room, and with each tunnel lines with hundreds of transcribers designed to work in unison.

entries.original: These transcribers are much simpler than the previous examples, but the central control processor has a wealth of data on it, more than we can process efficiently aboard [SHIP_NAME]. Maybe The Aletheia could help?
entries.translation: These transcribers are much simpler than the previous examples, but the central control processor has a wealth of data on it, more than we can process efficiently aboard [SHIP_NAME]. Maybe The Aletheia could help?

entries.original:
Scans show there was once an underground structure here, but seismic activity destroyed it long ago.

The only other evidence are some rare elements at higher than natural concentrations.
entries.translation:
Scans show there was once an underground structure here, but seismic activity destroyed it long ago.

The only other evidence are some rare elements at higher than natural concentrations.

entries.original: Ancient Orbiter
entries.translation: Ancient Orbiter

entries.original: This is a very old automated orbital defense station. In surprisingly good condition and still very dangerous.
entries.translation: This is a very old automated orbital defense station. In surprisingly good condition and still very dangerous.

entries.original: Genetic Augments
entries.translation: Genetic Augments

entries.original: This facility was responsible for "augmenting" the genetics of specific individuals to make them better suited for their roles in various ways. Extended lifespans, increased pain resistance, and so forth.
entries.translation: This facility was responsible for "augmenting" the genetics of specific individuals to make them better suited for their roles in various ways. Extended lifespans, increased pain resistance, and so forth.

entries.original: Imperial Monocultures
entries.translation: Imperial Monocultures

entries.original: A danger of genetically engineering "super populations" is that this suppresses genetic diversity and puts the entire pool at risk from a previously unknown threat. Surely the Empire was aware, but maybe they believed they could always engineer a solution. Still, I wouldn't be at all surprised if this wasn't a contributor to the fall.
entries.translation: A danger of genetically engineering "super populations" is that this suppresses genetic diversity and puts the entire pool at risk from a previously unknown threat. Surely the Empire was aware, but maybe they believed they could always engineer a solution. Still, I wouldn't be at all surprised if this wasn't a contributor to the fall.

entries.original: Sequence Transcriber
entries.translation: Sequence Transcriber

entries.original: This transcriber could take patterns in DNA or species equivalents and record them in an optical substrate and vice versa. The data is annotated, but there’s not enough context for the universal translator.
entries.translation: This transcriber could take patterns in DNA or species equivalents and record them in an optical substrate and vice versa. The data is annotated, but there’s not enough context for the universal translator.

entries.original: Ancient Orbiter
entries.translation: Ancient Orbiter

entries.original: What's Progent-A?
entries.translation: What's Progent-A?

entries.original: Progent-A is a pseudolocalization language that at a glance doesn't look like English, but instead is symbols that look close to English letters.
entries.translation: Progent-A is a pseudolocalization language that at a glance doesn't look like English, but instead is symbols that look close to English letters.

entries.original: This allows for testing of localization even if the tester does not speak any of the supported languages, and for testing character set replacement.
entries.translation: This allows for testing of localization even if the tester does not speak any of the supported languages, and for testing character set replacement.

entries.original: Greetings commander, this is a test of the localization system.
entries.translation: Greetings commander, this is a test of the localization system.

entries.original: This is a hint text.
entries.translation: This is a hint text.

entries.original: This is a notification.
entries.translation: This is a notification.

entries.original: A player response.
entries.translation: A player response.

entries.original: A response to the player, followed by linked topics.
entries.translation: A response to the player, followed by linked topics.

entries.original: A skill check.
entries.translation: A skill check.

entries.original: A skill result.
entries.translation: A skill result.

entries.original: Localization Test
entries.translation: Localization Test

entries.original: Localization ignores the test story, so this story is used specifically to test localization.
entries.translation: Localization ignores the test story, so this story is used specifically to test localization.

entries.original: First officer notification text.
entries.translation: First officer notification text.

entries.original: Extra help text.
entries.translation: Extra help text.

entries.original: Tactical officer notification.
entries.translation: Tactical officer notification.

entries.original: Tactics Notify
entries.translation: Tactics Notify

entries.original: Test detail.
entries.translation: Test detail.

entries.original: Localized Station News Item
entries.translation: Localized Station News Item

entries.original: Announcer
entries.translation: Announcer

entries.original: Locoan Commander
entries.translation: Locoan Commander

entries.original: Locoan
entries.translation: Locoan

entries.original:
Enough.

It is clear that we are no match for you in battle. We submit to your superiority. We offer reparations of 50 titanium and will make no further demands of the colony.
entries.translation:
Enough.

It is clear that we are no match for you in battle. We submit to your superiority. We offer reparations of 50 titanium and will make no further demands of the colony.

entries.original: Accept the offer.
entries.translation: Accept the offer.

entries.original: Take this offering as tribute to your superior abilities in conflict.
entries.translation: Take this offering as tribute to your superior abilities in conflict.

entries.original: Reject the offer.
entries.translation: Reject the offer.

entries.original: What do our Starcom Suzerain wish to discuss?
entries.translation: What do our Starcom Suzerain wish to discuss?

entries.original:
I've found playing with the Codex Shape item you discovered to be a relaxing way to unwind after my shift.

Early this evening I noticed that some decorative lines could be connected depending on the configuration. I was able to arrange them in a contiguous path that created a serpent-like pattern.

I showed the pattern to Dr. Rama and she confirmed it was a new set of gateway coordinates.

I'll send the coordinates to your nav computer.
entries.translation:
I've found playing with the Codex Shape item you discovered to be a relaxing way to unwind after my shift.

Early this evening I noticed that some decorative lines could be connected depending on the configuration. I was able to arrange them in a contiguous path that created a serpent-like pattern.

I showed the pattern to Dr. Rama and she confirmed it was a new set of gateway coordinates.

I'll send the coordinates to your nav computer.

entries.original:
We have watched your ships appear near the Ess'Sham and wondered when you would venture here.

Do you come as servant, same or suzerain to the Locoan?
entries.translation:
We have watched your ships appear near the Ess'Sham and wondered when you would venture here.

Do you come as servant, same or suzerain to the Locoan?

entries.original: They are trying to decide if we think we are weaker, equal or stronger in power to them. Given their first contact question is about strength, that is presumably a trait they respect.
entries.translation: They are trying to decide if we think we are weaker, equal or stronger in power to them. Given their first contact question is about strength, that is presumably a trait they respect.

entries.original: We are your humble servants.
entries.translation: We are your humble servants.

entries.original: Then our command is that you provide us with 20 units of titanium as tribute.
entries.translation: Then our command is that you provide us with 20 units of titanium as tribute.

entries.original: *Pay the tribute*
entries.translation: *Pay the tribute*

entries.original: Very good. You may pass through our domain. But do not take anything of value.
entries.translation: Very good. You may pass through our domain. But do not take anything of value.

entries.original: We do not have enough Titanium.
entries.translation: We do not have enough Titanium.

entries.original:
You are a poor servant.

Leave this region or perhaps we will look for our titanium in your hull.
entries.translation:
You are a poor servant.

Leave this region or perhaps we will look for our titanium in your hull.

entries.original: We are the same as you.
entries.translation: We are the same as you.

entries.original:
Perhaps similar in strength, but not in number as we have observed.

But if you do not challenge us, we will not challenge you. Tread softly here.
entries.translation:
Perhaps similar in strength, but not in number as we have observed.

But if you do not challenge us, we will not challenge you. Tread softly here.

entries.original: Treat us as Suzerain.
entries.translation: Treat us as Suzerain.

entries.original: You claim superiority? We have seen little in your numbers.
entries.translation: You claim superiority? We have seen little in your numbers.

entries.original: Perhaps we are not much stronger than you, but strong enough.
entries.translation: Perhaps we are not much stronger than you, but strong enough.

entries.original: *Try to convince the Locoan that you have a large force behind you.*
entries.translation: *Try to convince the Locoan that you have a large force behind you.*

entries.original:
We had never seen your ships before. And then suddenly one, two, three. Perhaps we see only those you wish for us to see?

We do not wish to risk your wrath, we seek peace with this gesture.
entries.translation:
We had never seen your ships before. And then suddenly one, two, three. Perhaps we see only those you wish for us to see?

We do not wish to risk your wrath, we seek peace with this gesture.

entries.original: It is true we saw none of you before and now there are few. Perhaps there are many more, perhaps few is all there is. But we will not test you.
entries.translation: It is true we saw none of you before and now there are few. Perhaps there are many more, perhaps few is all there is. But we will not test you.

entries.original:
Your boasts are hollow, like the *sh-susphil bird* that makes itself appear enormous but is actually quite... delicious.

Leave now, while you still can.
entries.translation:
Your boasts are hollow, like the *sh-susphil bird* that makes itself appear enormous but is actually quite... delicious.

Leave now, while you still can.

entries.original: We will crush you yet!
entries.translation: We will crush you yet!

entries.original: What do you request of us, Suzerain [PLAYER_NAME]?
entries.translation: What do you request of us, Suzerain [PLAYER_NAME]?

entries.original: Why do our servants call on us? We did not summon you.
entries.translation: Why do our servants call on us? We did not summon you.

entries.original: Greetings [PLAYER_NAME], what did you wish to discuss?
entries.translation: Greetings [PLAYER_NAME], what did you wish to discuss?

entries.original: We have visited a planet that you are demanding tribute from.
entries.translation: We have visited a planet that you are demanding tribute from.

entries.original: As is our right to demand from our servants. You should be grateful we do not demand as much from you.
entries.translation: As is our right to demand from our servants. You should be grateful we do not demand as much from you.

entries.original: *Try to convince them to lower the tribute they demand from the colony.*
entries.translation: *Try to convince them to lower the tribute they demand from the colony.*

entries.original:
Hmmm... your suggestion has merit. If they were allowed to prosper a little their production might improve in the future.

Very well, you may tell them their quotas are reduced 20%.
entries.translation:
Hmmm... your suggestion has merit. If they were allowed to prosper a little their production might improve in the future.

Very well, you may tell them their quotas are reduced 20%.

entries.original: We need these resources to fortify our defenses. However, if you can provide 50 units of Titanium, we will reduce our demands on the colony for a while.
entries.translation: We need these resources to fortify our defenses. However, if you can provide 50 units of Titanium, we will reduce our demands on the colony for a while.

entries.original: *Give the Titanium*
entries.translation: *Give the Titanium*

entries.original: Satisfactory. You may inform the colony that their tribute is relieved for the next solar cycle.
entries.translation: Satisfactory. You may inform the colony that their tribute is relieved for the next solar cycle.

entries.original: We're not giving you any Titanium. The planet is under our protection.
entries.translation: We're not giving you any Titanium. The planet is under our protection.

entries.original: You are trying to sabotage our control over this region. We will increase our demands as a lesson to the colony and leave your wreckage as a warning!
entries.translation: You are trying to sabotage our control over this region. We will increase our demands as a lesson to the colony and leave your wreckage as a warning!

entries.original: *Demand the Locoan leave the colony alone from now on.*
entries.translation: *Demand the Locoan leave the colony alone from now on.*

entries.original: As you command. You may tell the colony that we will demand no further tribute from them.
entries.translation: As you command. You may tell the colony that we will demand no further tribute from them.

entries.original:
You are another instigator. We will extract what we need from the colony. 

And from your broken hull.
entries.translation:
You are another instigator. We will extract what we need from the colony. 

And from your broken hull.

entries.original: *Do not press the issue for now.*
entries.translation: *Do not press the issue for now.*

entries.original: Yes, we collect resources from them and provide security in return.
entries.translation: Yes, we collect resources from them and provide security in return.

entries.original: About that colony...
entries.translation: About that colony...

entries.original: What do you know about the Devout?
entries.translation: What do you know about the Devout?

entries.original:
I am surprised. With your weak will I would expect you would already carry their mark.

But why I am answering your questions? You serve us.
entries.translation:
I am surprised. With your weak will I would expect you would already carry their mark.

But why I am answering your questions? You serve us.

entries.original:
Sssssf. Impudent proselytizers.

They have sent missionaries into our space. We have seen what happens where they gain a following, they do not last long.
entries.translation:
Sssssf. Impudent proselytizers.

They have sent missionaries into our space. We have seen what happens where they gain a following, they do not last long.

entries.original: What happened in this region? We've seen signs of a terrible war.
entries.translation: What happened in this region? We've seen signs of a terrible war.

entries.original: We do not educate our servants save for how to better serve us.
entries.translation: We do not educate our servants save for how to better serve us.

entries.original:
No fault of ours. 

As the empire fell, the former vassals fought over what beliefs were true and who or what made the laws. 

When they were done we offered... order.
entries.translation:
No fault of ours. 

As the empire fell, the former vassals fought over what beliefs were true and who or what made the laws. 

When they were done we offered... order.

entries.original: Tell us about the fall of the empire.
entries.translation: Tell us about the fall of the empire.

entries.original:
Surely it was here as it was... wherever you are from. The empire built the great works, kept order and peace. From great heights it fell.

Now her former vassals try to carve out little empires of their own.
entries.translation:
Surely it was here as it was... wherever you are from. The empire built the great works, kept order and peace. From great heights it fell.

Now her former vassals try to carve out little empires of their own.

entries.original: We discovered another of those polygonal artifacts. Do I get another reprieve from condescension?
entries.translation: We discovered another of those polygonal artifacts. Do I get another reprieve from condescension?

entries.original:
If you've seen one massive alien artifact emitting novel high-energy particles that don't interact with baryonic matter, you've seen them all.

Well that's not quite true, but we learned less from this one than the first.
entries.translation:
If you've seen one massive alien artifact emitting novel high-energy particles that don't interact with baryonic matter, you've seen them all.

Well that's not quite true, but we learned less from this one than the first.

entries.original:
After analyzing the particles emitted by that polyhedral artifact, I noticed that they created a very subtle resonance in the nearby gateways.

I've recalibrated Celaeno's long-range sensors and have picked up another such resonance. It is almost certainly another gateway.
entries.translation:
After analyzing the particles emitted by that polyhedral artifact, I noticed that they created a very subtle resonance in the nearby gateways.

I've recalibrated Celaeno's long-range sensors and have picked up another such resonance. It is almost certainly another gateway.

entries.original: We'll check it out.
entries.translation: We'll check it out.

entries.original: Silent Tower
entries.translation: Silent Tower

entries.original: A single communications tower is the only artificial structure on the entire planet. Despite its age, it's still mostly intact.
entries.translation: A single communications tower is the only artificial structure on the entire planet. Despite its age, it's still mostly intact.

entries.original:
[CREW_ENGINEERING] notes the tower is very similar to the one the team encountered earlier near the dust refinery.

One unusual point is that while there are the normal redundancy circuits, the data in them doesn't match the primary.
entries.translation:
[CREW_ENGINEERING] notes the tower is very similar to the one the team encountered earlier near the dust refinery.

One unusual point is that while there are the normal redundancy circuits, the data in them doesn't match the primary.

entries.original: Replace the primary data with the redundancy.
entries.translation: Replace the primary data with the redundancy.

entries.original:
The tower comes to life, charged by the remaining energy in its batteries, and transmits a repeating transmission into the sky for a few minutes.

After several repetitions, there is a shower of sparks as some key components give out.
entries.translation:
The tower comes to life, charged by the remaining energy in its batteries, and transmits a repeating transmission into the sky for a few minutes.

After several repetitions, there is a shower of sparks as some key components give out.

entries.original: Have the team return to the ship, for now.
entries.translation: Have the team return to the ship, for now.

entries.original: The control tower is still operational.
entries.translation: The control tower is still operational.

entries.original: A careful search of the immediate area reveals some unnatural mineral traces. [CREW_BIOMED] speculates they might be bones, but there's no way to be sure.
entries.translation: A careful search of the immediate area reveals some unnatural mineral traces. [CREW_BIOMED] speculates they might be bones, but there's no way to be sure.

entries.original:
Since the last time the team was here, someone has removed the remaining control system resources, leaving only the main structure.

There doesn't seem to be anything left to do here.
entries.translation:
Since the last time the team was here, someone has removed the remaining control system resources, leaving only the main structure.

There doesn't seem to be anything left to do here.

entries.original: The broken tower sits silent.
entries.translation: The broken tower sits silent.

entries.original: The broken tower sits silent. After examining the damage, [CREW_ENGINEERING] determines they could fix it well enough to broadcast one last transmission, although it would require a single unit of valuable Chiralite.
entries.translation: The broken tower sits silent. After examining the damage, [CREW_ENGINEERING] determines they could fix it well enough to broadcast one last transmission, although it would require a single unit of valuable Chiralite.

entries.original: *Fulfill the promise to the refugees (-1 Chiralite)*
entries.translation: *Fulfill the promise to the refugees (-1 Chiralite)*

entries.original:
It doesn't take [CREW_ENGINEERING] too long to make the necessary fixes and switch broadcast back to the original signal.

Just to be safe, they remove the redundancy unit for good.
entries.translation:
It doesn't take [CREW_ENGINEERING] too long to make the necessary fixes and switch broadcast back to the original signal.

Just to be safe, they remove the redundancy unit for good.

entries.original: *Fulfill the promise to the refugees (Need 1 Chiralite)*
entries.translation: *Fulfill the promise to the refugees (Need 1 Chiralite)*

entries.original: Have the team return to the ship, for now.
entries.translation: Have the team return to the ship, for now.

entries.original: Gentle Gas Giants
entries.translation: Gentle Gas Giants

entries.original: The lander is only able to penetrate the lower mesosphere of the gas giant due to the extreme atmospheric conditions, where they encounter a pod of gaseous squid-like creatures, who communicate using subtle colored wisps of fog, like those produced by the "fog machine".
entries.translation: The lander is only able to penetrate the lower mesosphere of the gas giant due to the extreme atmospheric conditions, where they encounter a pod of gaseous squid-like creatures, who communicate using subtle colored wisps of fog, like those produced by the "fog machine".

entries.original:
Even with the device, the universal translator's output is a confusing jumble:

*The three in one traders ask of the eight eyes of  the eight faces. "Deep in the shadow of the burning moon." Again the trader asks. Again they say deep in the shadow of the burning moon, very deep. In anger the trader brings the sun too close. All burn but us. Sadness.*
entries.translation:
Even with the device, the universal translator's output is a confusing jumble:

*The three in one traders ask of the eight eyes of  the eight faces. "Deep in the shadow of the burning moon." Again the trader asks. Again they say deep in the shadow of the burning moon, very deep. In anger the trader brings the sun too close. All burn but us. Sadness.*

entries.original: There's some confused metaphor in the translation, but my best guess is that someone was trying to extract information from them and attacked when they failed to understand 'Deep in the shadow of the burning moon.'
entries.translation: There's some confused metaphor in the translation, but my best guess is that someone was trying to extract information from them and attacked when they failed to understand 'Deep in the shadow of the burning moon.'

entries.original:
The lander is only able to penetrate the lower mesosphere of the gas giant due to the extreme atmospheric conditions, where they encounter a pod of gaseous squid-like creatures. [CREW_XENOCULTURE] attempts to make contact on a variety of EM frequencies as well as with sounds, lights and flight patterns.

Despite the creatures' shy interest, there's no success.
entries.translation:
The lander is only able to penetrate the lower mesosphere of the gas giant due to the extreme atmospheric conditions, where they encounter a pod of gaseous squid-like creatures. [CREW_XENOCULTURE] attempts to make contact on a variety of EM frequencies as well as with sounds, lights and flight patterns.

Despite the creatures' shy interest, there's no success.

entries.original: Lost Tribute
entries.translation: Lost Tribute

entries.original:
Someone went to great lengths to conceal this vessel, using thrusters to melt through the soft igneous rock until only the upper deck protruded.

Inside, the team finds a bipedal skeleton clutching a heavy tool beside several large containers of titanium.

The ship's log recorder is smashed and something has made numerous gouges in the deck plate.
entries.translation:
Someone went to great lengths to conceal this vessel, using thrusters to melt through the soft igneous rock until only the upper deck protruded.

Inside, the team finds a bipedal skeleton clutching a heavy tool beside several large containers of titanium.

The ship's log recorder is smashed and something has made numerous gouges in the deck plate.

entries.original: The gouge marks have a deliberateness to them. Perhaps writing?
entries.translation: The gouge marks have a deliberateness to them. Perhaps writing?

entries.original: Analyze the marks with the universal translator.
entries.translation: Analyze the marks with the universal translator.

entries.original:
It is indeed language, different from the rest of the ship's controls:

*"deliver the tribute when (untranslatable profanity)... I'd rather die buried with it than give another ingot ... (untranslatable profanity) worms eating Oglenth"*

This is followed by a longer passage, which is entirely untranslatable profanity. [CREW_XENOCULTURE] explains that this is not prudishness on the part of the universal translator, it simply cannot tell from the context what their vulgarity is based on.
entries.translation:
It is indeed language, different from the rest of the ship's controls:

*"deliver the tribute when (untranslatable profanity)... I'd rather die buried with it than give another ingot ... (untranslatable profanity) worms eating Oglenth"*

This is followed by a longer passage, which is entirely untranslatable profanity. [CREW_XENOCULTURE] explains that this is not prudishness on the part of the universal translator, it simply cannot tell from the context what their vulgarity is based on.

entries.original: Lunar Ore
entries.translation: Lunar Ore

entries.original:
This ordinary-looking moon has extraordinary amounts of Titanium collected from centuries of meteor deposits.

In a more traveled location it surely would have been cleared by now.
entries.translation:
This ordinary-looking moon has extraordinary amounts of Titanium collected from centuries of meteor deposits.

In a more traveled location it surely would have been cleared by now.

entries.original: Stripped Ship
entries.translation: Stripped Ship

entries.original:
The skeleton of former refuge ship has been stripped of all valuable resources.

There is no sign of any of the refugees.
entries.translation:
The skeleton of former refuge ship has been stripped of all valuable resources.

There is no sign of any of the refugees.

entries.original: Hidden Refuge
entries.translation: Hidden Refuge

entries.original:
An enormous cruiser has been sitting on the surface of this temperate world for some time, judging by the trees and plants growing on its hull.

Surprisingly, it is not a derelict: the energy signature is normal and a number of its systems are powered.

When the team approaches, a group of scaly bipeds comes toward to their position.
entries.translation:
An enormous cruiser has been sitting on the surface of this temperate world for some time, judging by the trees and plants growing on its hull.

Surprisingly, it is not a derelict: the energy signature is normal and a number of its systems are powered.

When the team approaches, a group of scaly bipeds comes toward to their position.

entries.original:
After a lengthy dialogue, [CREW_XENOCULTURE] explains that this vessel was one of many groups of refugees to flee the post-Empire conflicts. They were lucky in having the engineering skills to redirect a nearby Flinger temporarily and reach this remote system.

They are now concerned that with the Flinger directed here, it is only a matter of time before the Locoan, Devout or others seize their vessel.
entries.translation:
After a lengthy dialogue, [CREW_XENOCULTURE] explains that this vessel was one of many groups of refugees to flee the post-Empire conflicts. They were lucky in having the engineering skills to redirect a nearby Flinger temporarily and reach this remote system.

They are now concerned that with the Flinger directed here, it is only a matter of time before the Locoan, Devout or others seize their vessel.

entries.original: *"We would offer you the gold from our defunct engines and let you examine our ship's systems if you would promise to redirect the Flinger back away from our refuge."*
entries.translation: *"We would offer you the gold from our defunct engines and let you examine our ship's systems if you would promise to redirect the Flinger back away from our refuge."*

entries.original: Promise to redirect the Flinger.
entries.translation: Promise to redirect the Flinger.

entries.original:
*"We are most grateful. Once you have changed the Flinger's coordinates, it will be most inconvenient to return here. So, we will make good on our end of the bargain now and trust you to uphold yours.

"Please do not delay. It is only a matter of time before someone discovers us!"*
entries.translation:
*"We are most grateful. Once you have changed the Flinger's coordinates, it will be most inconvenient to return here. So, we will make good on our end of the bargain now and trust you to uphold yours.

"Please do not delay. It is only a matter of time before someone discovers us!"*

entries.original: Refuse the request.
entries.translation: Refuse the request.

entries.original:
The refugee representatives are disappointed.

They return to their ship refuge in resignation.
entries.translation:
The refugee representatives are disappointed.

They return to their ship refuge in resignation.

entries.original: Fallen Colony
entries.translation: Fallen Colony

entries.original:
This world is technically fairly advanced-- there are clear signs of space travel and other developments roughly on par with Starcom. But the quality of life and infrastructure is surprisingly poor. The main spaceport where the lander sets down has only a few small shuttles.

A government representative greets the team.

"On behalf of our people, we greet you humbly. We would offer tribute, but are forbidden by the Locoan. Instead, I am willing to offer myself to be eaten by you as a demonstration of our supplication."
entries.translation:
This world is technically fairly advanced-- there are clear signs of space travel and other developments roughly on par with Starcom. But the quality of life and infrastructure is surprisingly poor. The main spaceport where the lander sets down has only a few small shuttles.

A government representative greets the team.

"On behalf of our people, we greet you humbly. We would offer tribute, but are forbidden by the Locoan. Instead, I am willing to offer myself to be eaten by you as a demonstration of our supplication."

entries.original: Have [CREW_XENOCULTURE] turn down the offer and try to get an explanation.
entries.translation: Have [CREW_XENOCULTURE] turn down the offer and try to get an explanation.

entries.original:
The representative is visibly relieved.

He explains that as subjects of the Locoan, they have strict quotas on resource production which leaves almost nothing for development or offerings to other visitors.
entries.translation:
The representative is visibly relieved.

He explains that as subjects of the Locoan, they have strict quotas on resource production which leaves almost nothing for development or offerings to other visitors.

entries.original: These quotas must be terribly steep. They should be thriving but are on the verge of collapse.
entries.translation: These quotas must be terribly steep. They should be thriving but are on the verge of collapse.

entries.original:
After [CREW_XENOCULTURE] presses for details, the representative explains that after the empire fell, there was a long struggle between the factions of this region that devastated most of the inhabited worlds.

The surviving refugees gathered on this world to rebuild. When the Locoan arrived decades later, they were still far too weak to refuse their demands.
entries.translation:
After [CREW_XENOCULTURE] presses for details, the representative explains that after the empire fell, there was a long struggle between the factions of this region that devastated most of the inhabited worlds.

The surviving refugees gathered on this world to rebuild. When the Locoan arrived decades later, they were still far too weak to refuse their demands.

entries.original: Offer to help negotiate with the Locoan.
entries.translation: Offer to help negotiate with the Locoan.

entries.original:
The representative seems nervous.

"If they are amenable to lower quotas, that would help us immensely. But whatever you do, please do not anger the Locoan on our behalf. They can be quite unforgiving."
entries.translation:
The representative seems nervous.

"If they are amenable to lower quotas, that would help us immensely. But whatever you do, please do not anger the Locoan on our behalf. They can be quite unforgiving."

entries.original: Make no commitments to the colony.
entries.translation: Make no commitments to the colony.

entries.original: Have [CREW_XENOCULTURE] accept the offer.
entries.translation: Have [CREW_XENOCULTURE] accept the offer.

entries.original:
The team relays the news that the Locoan have agreed to lower their demands on the colony.

The representative is delighted-- given their precarity, even a modest improvement will allow them to improve their circumstances greatly.
entries.translation:
The team relays the news that the Locoan have agreed to lower their demands on the colony.

The representative is delighted-- given their precarity, even a modest improvement will allow them to improve their circumstances greatly.

entries.original:
The colony apologizes that they can offer no resources as reward, for obvious reasons, but a meaningful display of gratitude is important.

After [CREW_XENOCULTURE] explains that the team is specifically not interested in eating anyone, the colony offers a cultural relic leftover from the empire period whose original purpose has been forgotten.
entries.translation:
The colony apologizes that they can offer no resources as reward, for obvious reasons, but a meaningful display of gratitude is important.

After [CREW_XENOCULTURE] explains that the team is specifically not interested in eating anyone, the colony offers a cultural relic leftover from the empire period whose original purpose has been forgotten.

entries.original:
After the team informs the representative that the Locoan will be making no more demands of the colony, they are greeted with great celebration.

Without the burden of these tributes, they will be able to make many improvements.
entries.translation:
After the team informs the representative that the Locoan will be making no more demands of the colony, they are greeted with great celebration.

Without the burden of these tributes, they will be able to make many improvements.

entries.original: The planet's condition has not improved since our last visit.
entries.translation: The planet's condition has not improved since our last visit.

entries.original: War-torn World
entries.translation: War-torn World

entries.original:
This planet was devastated by war in the past few hundred years. Judging from the ages of the ruins, it was not a single cataclysmic attack, but a long series that spanned decades and gradually eroded the civilization's ability to recover.

It looks like the ruins have been thoroughly picked over by scavengers, but there may still be something worthwhile.
entries.translation:
This planet was devastated by war in the past few hundred years. Judging from the ages of the ruins, it was not a single cataclysmic attack, but a long series that spanned decades and gradually eroded the civilization's ability to recover.

It looks like the ruins have been thoroughly picked over by scavengers, but there may still be something worthwhile.

entries.original: Have the team search the ruins.
entries.translation: Have the team search the ruins.

entries.original:
In an archival building the team finds a large trove of census documents.

They show the planet was predominantly inhabited by a three-eyed humanoid species, but also was home to other alien races.
entries.translation:
In an archival building the team finds a large trove of census documents.

They show the planet was predominantly inhabited by a three-eyed humanoid species, but also was home to other alien races.

entries.original:
A building that looks like a media broadcasting center was once filled with holographical crystals, sadly almost all shattered.

A few fragments give a snapshot of daily life on the planet.
entries.translation:
A building that looks like a media broadcasting center was once filled with holographical crystals, sadly almost all shattered.

A few fragments give a snapshot of daily life on the planet.

entries.original: One of the smaller structures has some titanium reinforcements buried under rubble that looters missed.
entries.translation: One of the smaller structures has some titanium reinforcements buried under rubble that looters missed.

entries.original: One area that scavengers spent little time in were the refuse dumps. While they mostly contain heterogenous junk, some small amounts of aluminum had been separated out, presumably for recycling.
entries.translation: One area that scavengers spent little time in were the refuse dumps. While they mostly contain heterogenous junk, some small amounts of aluminum had been separated out, presumably for recycling.

entries.original: The team's initial impressions were correct: scavengers have had a long opportunity to remove anything of value.
entries.translation: The team's initial impressions were correct: scavengers have had a long opportunity to remove anything of value.

entries.original: While searching the narrow city streets, the team is ambushed by a feral band of three-eyed humanoids, presumably descendants of the original inhabitants.
entries.translation: While searching the narrow city streets, the team is ambushed by a feral band of three-eyed humanoids, presumably descendants of the original inhabitants.

entries.original: *The team defends themselves.*
entries.translation: *The team defends themselves.*

entries.original:
Despite the element of surprise, clubs and skins are no match for plasma rifles and armored environment suits.

The team beats the attack off easily, but [CREW_TACTICS] warns that the assailants may be quite desperate and the risk is not worth the reward of further search.
entries.translation:
Despite the element of surprise, clubs and skins are no match for plasma rifles and armored environment suits.

The team beats the attack off easily, but [CREW_TACTICS] warns that the assailants may be quite desperate and the risk is not worth the reward of further search.

entries.original:
Despite the team's advanced technology, the attackers know how to use ruins to their advantage.

The team is forced to make a poorly executed retreat.
entries.translation:
Despite the team's advanced technology, the attackers know how to use ruins to their advantage.

The team is forced to make a poorly executed retreat.

entries.original: The Yellow Fog
entries.translation: The Yellow Fog

entries.original:
A handful of broken skyscrapers rise out of an unnaturally thick yellow fog like decaying tree stumps in a swamp.

After [CREW_ASTRO] perches the lander atop one of the more stable-looking buildings, analysis of the fog shows that it is a complex molecule that wreaks havoc on anything organic, potentially including the seals in the team's suits.
entries.translation:
A handful of broken skyscrapers rise out of an unnaturally thick yellow fog like decaying tree stumps in a swamp.

After [CREW_ASTRO] perches the lander atop one of the more stable-looking buildings, analysis of the fog shows that it is a complex molecule that wreaks havoc on anything organic, potentially including the seals in the team's suits.

entries.original: The fog is probably a bioweapon intended to eliminate the population but leave the infrastructure intact.
entries.translation: The fog is probably a bioweapon intended to eliminate the population but leave the infrastructure intact.

entries.original: This civilization was wealthy: scans show valuable resources in the structures, but the most safely accessible have already been removed.
entries.translation: This civilization was wealthy: scans show valuable resources in the structures, but the most safely accessible have already been removed.

entries.original: There are still [remaining] structures that may hold valuable resources.
entries.translation: There are still [remaining] structures that may hold valuable resources.

entries.original: Have [CREW_OBSERVATION] lead the search for resources.
entries.translation: Have [CREW_OBSERVATION] lead the search for resources.

entries.original:
Bonanza!

One of the buildings has some neutronium-reinforced support.
entries.translation:
Bonanza!

One of the buildings has some neutronium-reinforced support.

entries.original: The team discovers an unassuming store room with a collection of valuable minerals. It doesn't seem like its original purpose. Perhaps some previous scavengers gathered their findings here, never able to return.
entries.translation: The team discovers an unassuming store room with a collection of valuable minerals. It doesn't seem like its original purpose. Perhaps some previous scavengers gathered their findings here, never able to return.

entries.original:
The team notices that the inhabitants shielded the exterior of some of the lower levels with Iridium. It would have been useless against the fog, but perhaps there were other threats?

Extracting it is difficult and dangerous work.
entries.translation:
The team notices that the inhabitants shielded the exterior of some of the lower levels with Iridium. It would have been useless against the fog, but perhaps there were other threats?

Extracting it is difficult and dangerous work.

entries.original:
The team spots the glint of Yttrium conductors in the duct work.

They are careful in prying it free, but it was apparently hiding a pocket of the dangerous mist.
entries.translation:
The team spots the glint of Yttrium conductors in the duct work.

They are careful in prying it free, but it was apparently hiding a pocket of the dangerous mist.

entries.original:
As the team explores a level with some aluminum scraps, the floor gives way, dropping half of the crew several meters into the upper mist.

Those safely above quickly pull them up, writhing in pain from the deadly vapors.
entries.translation:
As the team explores a level with some aluminum scraps, the floor gives way, dropping half of the crew several meters into the upper mist.

Those safely above quickly pull them up, writhing in pain from the deadly vapors.

entries.original: (Team is too injured to continue search)
entries.translation: (Team is too injured to continue search)

entries.original: Have the team return to the ship, for now.
entries.translation: Have the team return to the ship, for now.

entries.original: There are no remaining structures to search.
entries.translation: There are no remaining structures to search.

entries.original: Codex Serpent Gateway
entries.translation: Codex Serpent Gateway

entries.original: Lt. Milton has uncovered a new wormhole gateway with the Codex Shape.
entries.translation: Lt. Milton has uncovered a new wormhole gateway with the Codex Shape.

entries.original: The codex coordinates are located at [COORD].
entries.translation: The codex coordinates are located at [COORD].

entries.original: Locoan Vassals
entries.translation: Locoan Vassals

entries.original: We've found a colony that's being exploited by a group called the Locoan.
entries.translation: We've found a colony that's being exploited by a group called the Locoan.

entries.original: We've encountered a planet at [COORD] that's being exploited for resources by a faction called the Locoan.
entries.translation: We've encountered a planet at [COORD] that's being exploited for resources by a faction called the Locoan.

entries.original: Yeah, no, we're not doing that.
entries.translation: Yeah, no, we're not doing that.

entries.original: We've negotiated a lower tribute for the colony.
entries.translation: We've negotiated a lower tribute for the colony.

entries.original: We've freed the colony from the tyranny of the Locoan.
entries.translation: We've freed the colony from the tyranny of the Locoan.

entries.original: We've encountered a race of floating creatures in the atmosphere of a gas giant.
entries.translation: We've encountered a race of floating creatures in the atmosphere of a gas giant.

entries.original: Using the fog device, we were able to communicate with the gas giant creatures, who gave a cryptic response.
entries.translation: Using the fog device, we were able to communicate with the gas giant creatures, who gave a cryptic response.

entries.original: We've discovered another polygonal artifact.
entries.translation: We've discovered another polygonal artifact.

entries.original:
While reviewing our ship log I had a thought:
Remember those strange gas giant creatures?
They mentioned something about "the shadow of the burning moon."
entries.translation:
While reviewing our ship log I had a thought:
Remember those strange gas giant creatures?
They mentioned something about "the shadow of the burning moon."

entries.original: They said something that translated to "the shadow of the burning moon." There was a planetoid close by with high geologic activity. I bet they were referencing that.
entries.translation: They said something that translated to "the shadow of the burning moon." There was a planetoid close by with high geologic activity. I bet they were referencing that.

entries.original: Test Locoan
entries.translation: Test Locoan

entries.original: Test the Locoan region and vassals
entries.translation: Test the Locoan region and vassals

entries.original: Secret Passage
entries.translation: Secret Passage

entries.original: We've redirected a Flinger to a hidden system.
entries.translation: We've redirected a Flinger to a hidden system.

entries.original: We've agreed to reset the Flinger tower in order to keep the colony hidden.
entries.translation: We've agreed to reset the Flinger tower in order to keep the colony hidden.

entries.original: We need 1 unit of Chiralite to fix the broken Flinger tower.
entries.translation: We need 1 unit of Chiralite to fix the broken Flinger tower.

entries.original: We've redirected the Flinger back to its original coordinates, as promised.
entries.translation: We've redirected the Flinger back to its original coordinates, as promised.

entries.original:
Flinger is re-orienting toward original destination. 

That's a relief. I'd have felt guilty if we inadvertently led some faction like the Locoan to their location.
entries.translation:
Flinger is re-orienting toward original destination. 

That's a relief. I'd have felt guilty if we inadvertently led some faction like the Locoan to their location.

entries.original: So... are we going to redirect that Flinger like we promised?
entries.translation: So... are we going to redirect that Flinger like we promised?

entries.original: I wonder if there was something we could have done to help those refugees.
entries.translation: I wonder if there was something we could have done to help those refugees.

entries.original: Fog Machine
entries.translation: Fog Machine

entries.original: A spherical device that periodically emits wisps of colored gas.
entries.translation: A spherical device that periodically emits wisps of colored gas.

entries.original:
This device can convert a digital signal into an output of colored gas with various turbulence.

The signal conversion circuits have a sophisticated language processing network.
entries.translation:
This device can convert a digital signal into an output of colored gas with various turbulence.

The signal conversion circuits have a sophisticated language processing network.

entries.original: Blue Particles
entries.translation: Blue Particles

entries.original: This artifact is pulsing a large amount of exotic particles, with different energies than those we encountered before.
entries.translation: This artifact is pulsing a large amount of exotic particles, with different energies than those we encountered before.

entries.original: Demographic Documents
entries.translation: Demographic Documents

entries.original: These records show that this planet had several different species living on it, with different habitat modifications by dwelling.
entries.translation: These records show that this planet had several different species living on it, with different habitat modifications by dwelling.

entries.original: Locoan Civilization
entries.translation: Locoan Civilization

entries.original: The chemistry of this planet is compatible with the observed Locoan biology. Whether there's anything else to learn on the surface is irrelevant, since they won't let us land.
entries.translation: The chemistry of this planet is compatible with the observed Locoan biology. Whether there's anything else to learn on the surface is irrelevant, since they won't let us land.

entries.original: Refuge Ship
entries.translation: Refuge Ship

entries.original: The vessel is an impressive one, despite being several hundred years old. Its technology under the refugees' care will likely keep it working for centuries more.
entries.translation: The vessel is an impressive one, despite being several hundred years old. Its technology under the refugees' care will likely keep it working for centuries more.

entries.original: Religious Schism
entries.translation: Religious Schism

entries.original: Records that date from just prior to the destruction show that the planet was experiencing a religious revival and tensions were increasing between various sects.
entries.translation: Records that date from just prior to the destruction show that the planet was experiencing a religious revival and tensions were increasing between various sects.

entries.original: Unusual Compounds
entries.translation: Unusual Compounds

entries.original: The atmosphere of this planet has some unusual Dimethyl compounds we've never seen before. Definitely want to double check the seals on our envirosuits before landing.
entries.translation: The atmosphere of this planet has some unusual Dimethyl compounds we've never seen before. Definitely want to double check the seals on our envirosuits before landing.

entries.original: Collector
entries.translation: Collector

entries.original: Enforcer
entries.translation: Enforcer

entries.original: Locoan Base
entries.translation: Locoan Base

entries.original: Reliquary
entries.translation: Reliquary

entries.original: Abandoned Settlements
entries.translation: Abandoned Settlements

entries.original:
A small city on this temperate planet was abandoned within the past few hundred years, judging from the overgrowth.

As there are no signs of earlier civilizations, [CREW_XENOCULTURE] concludes this was a spacefaring culture that settled here for no more than a generation before moving on.
entries.translation:
A small city on this temperate planet was abandoned within the past few hundred years, judging from the overgrowth.

As there are no signs of earlier civilizations, [CREW_XENOCULTURE] concludes this was a spacefaring culture that settled here for no more than a generation before moving on.

entries.original:
A search of the structures uncovers several scattered fragmentary texts. 

*"... began Eye observation of Spearhead candidates ..."*

*"... Devoted have learned of the reliquary ... bones must be moved ..."*

*"... they will seek the heartbeat ... "*

*"... perhaps deceived by false echoes? ..."*
entries.translation:
A search of the structures uncovers several scattered fragmentary texts. 

*"... began Eye observation of Spearhead candidates ..."*

*"... Devoted have learned of the reliquary ... bones must be moved ..."*

*"... they will seek the heartbeat ... "*

*"... perhaps deceived by false echoes? ..."*

entries.original:
Another, older, Arkadian settlement. 

[CREW_ENGINEERING] speculates that given material age differences, the structures were built over a short period of time with advanced equipment.

Within an underground chamber, the team uncovers a crystalline data storage device.
entries.translation:
Another, older, Arkadian settlement. 

[CREW_ENGINEERING] speculates that given material age differences, the structures were built over a short period of time with advanced equipment.

Within an underground chamber, the team uncovers a crystalline data storage device.

entries.original:
Analysis shows that it is an apparent catalog(?) of binary identifiers and named entities:

010111 : Endless Arch
(Deleted entry)
(Deleted entry)
(Deleted entry)
011011 : Broken God
(Data corrupted) : New Reliquary
011101 : Dead Star
(Deleted entry)
011111 : Dying home

There are no other clues as to what they refer to or their significance.
entries.translation:
Analysis shows that it is an apparent catalog(?) of binary identifiers and named entities:

010111 : Endless Arch
(Deleted entry)
(Deleted entry)
(Deleted entry)
011011 : Broken God
(Data corrupted) : New Reliquary
011101 : Dead Star
(Deleted entry)
011111 : Dying home

There are no other clues as to what they refer to or their significance.

entries.original:
Yet another old Arkadian settlement.

One of the structure has a faded carving on an exterior wall.
entries.translation:
Yet another old Arkadian settlement.

One of the structure has a faded carving on an exterior wall.

entries.original: Closer examination shows a collection of crossmarks connected by lines.
entries.translation: Closer examination shows a collection of crossmarks connected by lines.

entries.original: Arkadian Reliquary
entries.translation: Arkadian Reliquary

entries.original: [hail]
entries.translation: [hail]

entries.original: Transmit the Talonian's name.
entries.translation: Transmit the Talonian's name.

entries.original: You have spoken the name of the Bronze one, the divine caretaker who watches over our sleeping ancestors. How do you know this?
entries.translation: You have spoken the name of the Bronze one, the divine caretaker who watches over our sleeping ancestors. How do you know this?

entries.original: It was given to us by the Talonian within the Generation Ark.
entries.translation: It was given to us by the Talonian within the Generation Ark.

entries.original:
She has awoken? We have waited ten generations to hear her voice. 

What message does she have for us?
entries.translation:
She has awoken? We have waited ten generations to hear her voice. 

What message does she have for us?

entries.original: It is time for the Ark to enter the new universe. We need the Talonian’s Eye to open the gateway.
entries.translation: It is time for the Ark to enter the new universe. We need the Talonian’s Eye to open the gateway.

entries.original:
It has been so long, we had abandoned hope. I apologize that we attacked you when we first met. So many have tried to take the sacred bones 
from us.

What is your name, stranger?
entries.translation:
It has been so long, we had abandoned hope. I apologize that we attacked you when we first met. So many have tried to take the sacred bones 
from us.

What is your name, stranger?

entries.original: I am [PLAYER_NAME] of [SHIP_NAME].
entries.translation: I am [PLAYER_NAME] of [SHIP_NAME].

entries.original:
Thank you [PLAYER_NAME] of [SHIP_NAME].

In recognition of the momentous occasion, we shall give you the honorary title "1011111011000001 of 1011111011000010".
entries.translation:
Thank you [PLAYER_NAME] of [SHIP_NAME].

In recognition of the momentous occasion, we shall give you the honorary title "1011111011000001 of 1011111011000010".

entries.original: The Watch Tower
entries.translation: The Watch Tower

entries.original:
A strange tower rises out of a snowy crevasse as the wind howls around the team.

The structure has all the hallmarks of Remnant tech and is just as inscrutable.

There is an alien device on it with markings, but not enough context for the universal translator to resolve.
entries.translation:
A strange tower rises out of a snowy crevasse as the wind howls around the team.

The structure has all the hallmarks of Remnant tech and is just as inscrutable.

There is an alien device on it with markings, but not enough context for the universal translator to resolve.

entries.original:
A strange tower rises out of a snowy crevasse as the wind howls around the team.

The structure has all the hallmarks of Remnant tech and is just as inscrutable.

Near its base is an attachment that seems out of place. [CREW_XENOCULTURE] recognizes  markings on it as the "Stalker" Arkadian dialect.
entries.translation:
A strange tower rises out of a snowy crevasse as the wind howls around the team.

The structure has all the hallmarks of Remnant tech and is just as inscrutable.

Near its base is an attachment that seems out of place. [CREW_XENOCULTURE] recognizes  markings on it as the "Stalker" Arkadian dialect.

entries.original:
It is a simple device, clearly added by a civilization more on par with our own. It has a label that translates as "Watch Tower" although [CREW_XENOCULTURE] notes that the first word is closer in meaning to "Eye".

It consists of a binary display and five toggle buttons.

The display reads [binary].
entries.translation:
It is a simple device, clearly added by a civilization more on par with our own. It has a label that translates as "Watch Tower" although [CREW_XENOCULTURE] notes that the first word is closer in meaning to "Eye".

It consists of a binary display and five toggle buttons.

The display reads [binary].

entries.original: Press "Transmit"
entries.translation: Press "Transmit"

entries.original:
A deep reverberation, unregistered by instruments, is felt at once by the entire team and all aboard [SHIP_NAME].

The interface now seems disabled, at least for the moment.
entries.translation:
A deep reverberation, unregistered by instruments, is felt at once by the entire team and all aboard [SHIP_NAME].

The interface now seems disabled, at least for the moment.

entries.original: Press "Transmit"
entries.translation: Press "Transmit"

entries.original: Have the team return to the ship, for now.
entries.translation: Have the team return to the ship, for now.

entries.original: The device appears to be in the process of recharging. [CREW_ENGINEERING] thinks it may be ready to transmit again soon.
entries.translation: The device appears to be in the process of recharging. [CREW_ENGINEERING] thinks it may be ready to transmit again soon.

entries.original:
The device attachment reads:

[binary]
entries.translation:
The device attachment reads:

[binary]

entries.original: From the "Stalker" fragments I've analyzed, it's clear their binary hail is not their language.
entries.translation: From the "Stalker" fragments I've analyzed, it's clear their binary hail is not their language.

entries.original: Treasure map!
entries.translation: Treasure map!

entries.original: Or a constellation. Like almost every civilization in the universe invents stories about.
entries.translation: Or a constellation. Like almost every civilization in the universe invents stories about.

entries.original: Sensors picked up some kind of brief reading nearby, a few seconds after the tower did its transmission thing.
entries.translation: Sensors picked up some kind of brief reading nearby, a few seconds after the tower did its transmission thing.

entries.original: Arkadian Texts
entries.translation: Arkadian Texts

entries.original: The language is related to that of the Arkadians, but a distinct dialect. Unusually they use binary symbols for important or sacred names.
entries.translation: The language is related to that of the Arkadians, but a distinct dialect. Unusually they use binary symbols for important or sacred names.

entries.original: Reliquary
entries.translation: Reliquary

entries.original: Adm. Jefferson Brunton
entries.translation: Adm. Jefferson Brunton

entries.original: NeoLogic Officer
entries.translation: NeoLogic Officer

entries.original: Morningstar
entries.translation: Morningstar

entries.original:
[PLAYER_LASTNAME], it's good to finally meet you. I've read Cdre. Yu's detailed report on [SHIP_NAME]'s accomplishments.

Very impressive.

You've come a long way and your crew deserve a break, so I'll skip the glad handing.
entries.translation:
[PLAYER_LASTNAME], it's good to finally meet you. I've read Cdre. Yu's detailed report on [SHIP_NAME]'s accomplishments.

Very impressive.

You've come a long way and your crew deserve a break, so I'll skip the glad handing.

entries.original:
We're going to need to put you all under a strict secrecy decree. Even though the "Vacuum Decay" risk is now close to zero with the wormhole collapsed, no one wants to try to reassure the general public of that.

Also, there's a lot of new discoveries that you made which we want to take some time to study. Huge social benefit potentials, but also security concerns.
entries.translation:
We're going to need to put you all under a strict secrecy decree. Even though the "Vacuum Decay" risk is now close to zero with the wormhole collapsed, no one wants to try to reassure the general public of that.

Also, there's a lot of new discoveries that you made which we want to take some time to study. Huge social benefit potentials, but also security concerns.

entries.original:
These Talonian fragments, for example. Our civilian partners in NeoLogic are already making huge discoveries here at Morningstar. Lots of potential for their NL series automatons and our new AI systems to improve security and quality of life.

I'm supposed to offer you a Commodore level desk position back at fleet and reassign your command crew here where we can keep an eye on them.

How does that sound?
entries.translation:
These Talonian fragments, for example. Our civilian partners in NeoLogic are already making huge discoveries here at Morningstar. Lots of potential for their NL series automatons and our new AI systems to improve security and quality of life.

I'm supposed to offer you a Commodore level desk position back at fleet and reassign your command crew here where we can keep an eye on them.

How does that sound?

entries.original: I don't think so.
entries.translation: I don't think so.

entries.original:
Given Vin's report, I told them that was unlikely.

Your other option is we keep you all in the field, aboard [SHIP_NAME]. With the help of the Heretic tech we've managed to get an experimental new gateway up and running.

We've sent a few scouts through, but there's a whole new galaxy to explore. 

So if they can't keep you behind a desk, they'd like you as far away as possible.
entries.translation:
Given Vin's report, I told them that was unlikely.

Your other option is we keep you all in the field, aboard [SHIP_NAME]. With the help of the Heretic tech we've managed to get an experimental new gateway up and running.

We've sent a few scouts through, but there's a whole new galaxy to explore. 

So if they can't keep you behind a desk, they'd like you as far away as possible.

entries.original: That'll do just fine.
entries.translation: That'll do just fine.

entries.original:
Very good, captain. Until the powers above me figure out how we want to handle this situation, I think [SHIP_NAME] should be where you work best, in the unknown.

When you're ready, the Portal is active.
entries.translation:
Very good, captain. Until the powers above me figure out how we want to handle this situation, I think [SHIP_NAME] should be where you work best, in the unknown.

When you're ready, the Portal is active.

entries.original: Fleck no.
entries.translation: Fleck no.

entries.original: Definitely not.
entries.translation: Definitely not.

entries.original: Whenever your crew is ready, [PLAYER_NAME] make your way to the gateway. It's powered up now.
entries.translation: Whenever your crew is ready, [PLAYER_NAME] make your way to the gateway. It's powered up now.

entries.original: [SHIP_NAME] standby for clearance.
entries.translation: [SHIP_NAME] standby for clearance.

entries.original: Confirmed. Proceed to Morningstar, sir.
entries.translation: Confirmed. Proceed to Morningstar, sir.

entries.original: You're already confirmed to proceed, sir.
entries.translation: You're already confirmed to proceed, sir.

entries.original: So, is this it, are we finally home for good?
entries.translation: So, is this it, are we finally home for good?

entries.original: Yes, I think this is it this time.
entries.translation: Yes, I think this is it this time.

entries.original: Yay! To Caliban's to celebrate!
entries.translation: Yay! To Caliban's to celebrate!

entries.original: I hope they don't reassign us. [SHIP_NAME] was only a field assignment.
entries.translation: I hope they don't reassign us. [SHIP_NAME] was only a field assignment.

entries.original: Morningstar Research Lab
entries.translation: Morningstar Research Lab

entries.original: Glass Enemy
entries.translation: Glass Enemy

entries.original: Test Artifact
entries.translation: Test Artifact

entries.original: Test artifact for music, ignore.
entries.translation: Test artifact for music, ignore.

entries.original: Scout
entries.translation: Scout

entries.original: Test Base
entries.translation: Test Base

entries.original:
The boiling of the Nimion war has been a two faced knife.

Demand for our services within the effect regions has increased exponentially. But both Nimion and Kyrnan take great offense at our deliveries to the other. We lose many ships this way.

Now sometimes we have a delivery to a Kyrnan world and nobody is there to sign for it.
entries.translation:
The boiling of the Nimion war has been a two faced knife.

Demand for our services within the effect regions has increased exponentially. But both Nimion and Kyrnan take great offense at our deliveries to the other. We lose many ships this way.

Now sometimes we have a delivery to a Kyrnan world and nobody is there to sign for it.

entries.original: Dead Forest
entries.translation: Dead Forest

entries.original:
This planet has experienced an environmental catastrophe. Based on dendrochronology, the "tree network" that was the foundation of the ecosystem died very recently, certainly within the last year.

Most other plants and animals soon followed.
entries.translation:
This planet has experienced an environmental catastrophe. Based on dendrochronology, the "tree network" that was the foundation of the ecosystem died very recently, certainly within the last year.

Most other plants and animals soon followed.

entries.original: There are too many variables here to determine a root cause. No pun intended.
entries.translation: There are too many variables here to determine a root cause. No pun intended.

entries.original:
Another arbor apocalypse, this one even more recent.

There are signs that a Kyrnan population evacuated from the planet with only partial success.
entries.translation:
Another arbor apocalypse, this one even more recent.

There are signs that a Kyrnan population evacuated from the planet with only partial success.

entries.original: Another planet of dead trees.
entries.translation: Another planet of dead trees.

entries.original: Kyrnan Forest
entries.translation: Kyrnan Forest

entries.original: This lush planet is home to several Kyrnan colonies. The Kyrnan appear to live in widely dispersed settlements. Their technology is heavily based on some very interesting bio-engineered trees.
entries.translation: This lush planet is home to several Kyrnan colonies. The Kyrnan appear to live in widely dispersed settlements. Their technology is heavily based on some very interesting bio-engineered trees.

entries.original: The team is able to find few Kyrnan: the ones they talk to report that the population is being dispersed as a precaution against Nimion attack.
entries.translation: The team is able to find few Kyrnan: the ones they talk to report that the population is being dispersed as a precaution against Nimion attack.

entries.original: The team is unable to locate any Kyrnan. A nearby settlement shows signs of having evacuated just prior to their arrival.
entries.translation: The team is unable to locate any Kyrnan. A nearby settlement shows signs of having evacuated just prior to their arrival.

entries.original: Another Kyrnan forest world. The colony the team lands near is completely evacuated.
entries.translation: Another Kyrnan forest world. The colony the team lands near is completely evacuated.

entries.original: Arbor Apocalypse
entries.translation: Arbor Apocalypse

entries.original: A prion infection has infected these trees, causing the botanical equivalent of neural degeneration.
entries.translation: A prion infection has infected these trees, causing the botanical equivalent of neural degeneration.

entries.original: Kyrnan Trees
entries.translation: Kyrnan Trees

entries.original: The trees act as both a data network and fabrication system. They are capable of growing not only food and medicine, but complex objects as well.
entries.translation: The trees act as both a data network and fabrication system. They are capable of growing not only food and medicine, but complex objects as well.

entries.original: Schematic Inventory
entries.translation: Schematic Inventory

entries.original:
While the factory was running, it allowed me access to the recent schematic catalog.

The designs were mostly drones we've encountered already, but I was able to learn more from their blueprints than their debris.
entries.translation:
While the factory was running, it allowed me access to the recent schematic catalog.

The designs were mostly drones we've encountered already, but I was able to learn more from their blueprints than their debris.

entries.original: Red Defenders
entries.translation: Red Defenders

entries.original:
[PLAYER_NAME], it is an unanticipated pleasure to see you here.

What is the occasion for this visit?
entries.translation:
[PLAYER_NAME], it is an unanticipated pleasure to see you here.

What is the occasion for this visit?

entries.original: It is true they did not expect to see us. I am less sure about the "pleasure" modifier: there is something about their affect that is masked.
entries.translation: It is true they did not expect to see us. I am less sure about the "pleasure" modifier: there is something about their affect that is masked.

entries.original: Our systems were hit by an informational hazard. Dr. Rama vaguely alluded to you in her... observations.
entries.translation: Our systems were hit by an informational hazard. Dr. Rama vaguely alluded to you in her... observations.

entries.original:
Ah yes, Dr. Rama's famously *candid* observations. I'll use my imagination for the specifics.

It's true, our further investigations into the Fallen Empire, specifically the Heretics, have hinted that they were investigating what we call informational hazards.
entries.translation:
Ah yes, Dr. Rama's famously *candid* observations. I'll use my imagination for the specifics.

It's true, our further investigations into the Fallen Empire, specifically the Heretics, have hinted that they were investigating what we call informational hazards.

entries.original:
It actually was a hot topic in xenoculture back when I graduated. Also known as "forbidden knowledge", it referred to information that posed a threat in itself. Somewhere between a computer virus and intrusive thought, it was proven that all neural networks were theoretically at risk.

[CREW_XENOCULTURE] has observed that the Heretics had been doing a lot of research into low or no-tech data storage systems.

We'd assumed that it was to preserve the knowledge in the event of wide-spread collapse.
entries.translation:
It actually was a hot topic in xenoculture back when I graduated. Also known as "forbidden knowledge", it referred to information that posed a threat in itself. Somewhere between a computer virus and intrusive thought, it was proven that all neural networks were theoretically at risk.

[CREW_XENOCULTURE] has observed that the Heretics had been doing a lot of research into low or no-tech data storage systems.

We'd assumed that it was to preserve the knowledge in the event of wide-spread collapse.

entries.original:
But some of the archives you recovered suggested they were at least as concerned with data storage methods that didn't involve any computation.

Apparently they were looking for ways to study "forbidden knowledge" without their systems becoming corrupted by it.

The big gaps in their records may be partly explained by their informational hygiene, as it were.
entries.translation:
But some of the archives you recovered suggested they were at least as concerned with data storage methods that didn't involve any computation.

Apparently they were looking for ways to study "forbidden knowledge" without their systems becoming corrupted by it.

The big gaps in their records may be partly explained by their informational hygiene, as it were.

entries.original:
The data in the crystal you analyzed doesn't appear to be the actual forbidden knowledge they were worried about. 

Instead it was sort of like a bad facsimile.
entries.translation:
The data in the crystal you analyzed doesn't appear to be the actual forbidden knowledge they were worried about. 

Instead it was sort of like a bad facsimile.

entries.original: Our computers seem to be acting up. [CREW_ENGINEERING] thinks we need a hard reset.
entries.translation: Our computers seem to be acting up. [CREW_ENGINEERING] thinks we need a hard reset.

entries.original: Acting up? Is this "ironic understatement"? [SHIP_NAME] is having an anaphylactic attack from ingesting hostile data. You could have destroyed her.
entries.translation: Acting up? Is this "ironic understatement"? [SHIP_NAME] is having an anaphylactic attack from ingesting hostile data. You could have destroyed her.

entries.original: Also us.
entries.translation: Also us.

entries.original:
If I threw a vacuum flask, I could hit three lab assistants who know enough to add a Kolmogorov filter before adding computational resources to an analysis of unknown data.

Crew is replaceable, we only have two ships.
entries.translation:
